1.title: Which Lovely girl are we growing?

11.content: Which way is Ruby growing?
11.title: Growing Ruby!

She just has a MASSIVE growth spurt!
111.content: How would the red hooded girl grow?
111.title: Growing Ruby!

1111.content:
On a Sunday before classes would resume for the week tomorrow Ruby, in her usual attire, was sitting on the floor of her Team's Dorm reading a Comic Book when the door opened and entered her partner, Weiss Schnee with a large briefcase in one hand.

"Hey Weiss, what's that?"

"Just another delivery of Dust from my father for Myrtenaster." Weiss answered nonchalantly as she sets the briefcase on a desk next to her left.

"I'll be borrowing the bathroom to wash up."

Once Weiss reached to the other side of the Dorm where their bathroom is, she opens the bathroom door before pausing, "Oh and Ruby? Don't even think about looking through my Dust!"

With that, the heiress went to the bathroom while Ruby just pouted from her spot.

Then she smirked, "Well... it's not like she would notice anything strange if I move fast enough~!"

With that Ruby puts her Comic down and briefly used her Semblance before she carefully opened the briefcase and began inspecting each vial of powdered Dust, "Let's see what we have here... some Ice Dust, not surprising... Fire Dust... Lightning Dust..."

After a few minutes, Ruby decided that she had seen enough was about to close the case when she noticed another vial of powdered Dust that she had somehow missed, "Hmm? What's this?"

Picking the vial up Ruby saw that it was filled with Dust... only of a type that she does not recognize and was a rather odd color.

"What kind of Dust is this? Gravity? No, it would've been purple..."

Ruby was so focused on this unknown Dust that she didn't notice the bathroom door had opened and that Weiss was not pleased seeing her partner rummaging through her briefcase, "RUBY! What are you doing?!"

"W-Weiss! I was just-!"

But in her panic, Ruby accidentally dropped the vial she was holding causing it to shatter on the floor, releasing the Dust and cover Ruby completely while Weiss stood in disbelief and shock at what her partner just did. But at the same time, she was also confused at what kind of Dust she was looking at as the color of the Dust alone was something that she had never seen before.

Neither of the two girls said anything as the cloud of Dust slowly dissipated as Ruby coughed and closed her eyes when...
1111.title: The Dust Accident

11111.content:
Ruby groaned as she clutches her stomach, "What's happening to me?"

"Ruby? Maybe we should go to..." Weiss suddenly trailed off on what her suggestion would be as Ruby looked at her partner and noticed that the heiress was staring at her wide-eyed.

"Weiss? What's wrong? Is there something-" Ruby stopped when she noticed that the room seemed to gradually shrink before her eyes before she felt her clothes feeling tighter than usual.

Confused, Ruby check herself and her eyes widen in shock when she noticed that her sleeves were slowly slipping up her arms! Then both girls heard ripping sounds and looked at Ruby's feet and saw that her stockings were ripped open in several places!

"R-Ruby... You're growing!" Weiss blurted out, still in shock at what seemed impossible.

Ruby stared at her partner in disbelief, "What?! But, I can't possibly be..."

She didn't get to finish her sentence when her the red lacings started to creak and soon Ruby found it a little hard to breathe as she reaches 6 feet.

Panicking, Ruby quickly removed her black belt as well as her precious red hooded cloak onto the floor. But as she was about to try to remove her boots, several of the lacings snapped off and then her blouse ripped open at where her chest is.

"Weiss... help..." Ruby pleaded as more of her clothes started to rip in several areas and her boots now feel really tight as she closes in at 6'4".

"Wha-what can I do?! I don't even know what that Dust you inhaled is!"

That didn't help to make things get any better as Ruby's clothes soon start getting torn apart as first the lacings holding her skirt snapped causing the skirt to fall onto the floor passing 6'6" exposing her panties.

Ruby's stockings had since been ripped up leaving her almost bare in the lower half of her body. Next, her blouse continued to get ripped up as the hole where her chest is expanded before her shoulders tear at the bouse's seams as she passes 6'7".

Blushing, Ruby tried to cover her self as her painfully tight boots bulged as a result of her expanding feet. Ruby couldn't say anything before she passes 6'8" and her bouse finally splits up halfway into two pieces, while at the same time her toes finally made progress emerging out of her boots.

She is now half-naked in only her smaller, tightening underwear and what remained of her boots!

Weiss stammered, "Ruby... s-stop growing! You're g-getting too big!"

"I- I don't know how!" Ruby exclaimed as she passes 7 feet and to her embarrassment, her bra snapped and fell off her exposing her breasts!

Blushing bright red, Ruby covered her breasts as her panties stretched and dug into her thighs before they too snapped off as she passes 7'2", forcing her to try and completely cover herself!

Ruby then looked down and saw that her feet had finally broken out of what remained of her boots.

Weiss continued to stare as Ruby kicked off her destroyed boots but continued to grow as they looked at each other in shock.
11111.title: Dust Growth

111111.content:
"This can't really be happening!" Ruby mentally chanted over and over as she looks down at her now much smaller partner as she grew past 8 feet before looking around the dorm and noticed she is getting closer to the ceiling. Forcing her to get down on her knees to give herself a bit more room.

Weiss took a step back still wide-eyed in disbelief at the sight of her towering and still growing naked partner/leader. "How is this possible? Just what kind of Dust did my father sent to me that could make anyone grow into a giant? But quickly, Weiss realized that if Ruby does not get out now she could get stuck or worse destroy the room and possibly the building if she does not stop growing.

"Ruby! You have to get out here!"

The now 10 feet Ruby looked down at Weiss in confusion, "Huh? What do you mean?"

Though a little intimidated by Ruby looking down at her, Weiss explained, "What do you think would happen if you keep growing and stay in our dorm?"

For a moment confusion was all Ruby could feel until her eyes widened at the implication, "Oh no! If I stay I could get trapped in here! I have to-"

But at that moment, she suddenly winced and without warning, Ruby's growth suddenly sped up as she quickly passes 12 feet and slammed her head into the ceiling!

"Ow!" Dazed, Ruby tumbled forward and managed to stop herself from slamming into the floor. After shaking her head, she now finds herself on all fours hovering over her partner who fell on her back and slightly raised her arms. "Weiss! Are you okay?"

Weiss didn't reply as she looks up at the 14 foot (and still growing) Ruby and her mind raced, "How much bigger is she going to get?!"
111111.title: Looming Rose

choices: A - Reignite her growth! (Grows every time Ruby absorbs Dust.)
B - No affect, and soon stops growing. (21-22 feet tall)
1111111.content:
All Weiss could do was stare at the looming Ruby who continues to grow bigger and bigger until Ruby, worried that Weiss had not responded to her, asked again, "Weiss...? I didn't hurt you did I?"

Weiss blinked and shook her head before looking up at her still growing partner/leader before getting back up, "I... I'm fine Ruby... Just..."

She trailed off as Ruby grew to 18 feet and began to fill up whatever remaining space their Dorm had left. Though she noticed that Ruby's growth has slowed down a bit, and blushed a bit when she glanced at Ruby's cleavage, "I guess she will stop growing soon. But... what are we going to do after that? She is too big to get out of the Dorm now!"

Before either girl could say/do anything Ruby shifted her position a little bit, unaware of her larger leg inadvertently hit Weiss' desk and knocked over the case still filled with the remaining Dust Vials causing them to shatter!

Ruby (now 20 feet tall) froze as she glances at the cloud of Dust that partially covered her and unwillingly absorbs it into her body. And as the last of the remaining Dust is absorbed, it...

A - Reignites her growth! (Ruby will now grow each time she absorbs any type of Dust.)

B - Has no effect on her and Ruby will eventually stop growing. (21 or 22 feet tall)
1111111.title: Still Rising

choices: CHOO! *BOOM!* (Big increase in height to due to the Dust!)
CHOO! *BOOM!* (Slight extra height increase due to the Dust.)
11112.content:
Ruby twitched as her nose suddenly itched, "Aaah~! Aaah~!"

Weiss' eyes widen as memories of when she first met Ruby flashbacked to her and immediately stepped back away from her partner.

"Aaah~! Aaah- CHOO!"

Before Weiss' eyes, the second Ruby finally sneezed her clothes ripped open in several places as she suddenly increased in height by a full foot!

"R-Ruby?!"

But Ruby didn't properly hear Weiss' exclamation as she sneezed again destroying her remaining clothes leaving only her tight bra and panties as well as what's left of her shoes after her feet busted out before Ruby sneezed once more quickly snapping her underwear instantly and destroyed her shoes leaving the red-headed girl naked and over 7 feet!

After rubbing her nose, Ruby slowly opened her eyes and was at first confused when she noticed Weiss looking unusually smaller before looking down at herself and was shocked to see that she was both naked and bigger!

"W-what happened to me-?!"

To both girls dismay, Ruby suddenly gets cut off when the itch returned only worse than before, "O-oh no not again-! G-Aaah~, Aaah~, Aaah~! Aaa-CHOO!"

There was nothing Weiss could do but watch as her partner rose up with each sneeze before Ruby hits her head on the ceiling after sneezing over 9 feet causing her to fall on her butt. Unfortunately, her sneezing did not stop as Ruby rose another 5 feet banging her head on the ceiling once more and forced to bend her neck.

In all the confusion of Ruby's sneezing growth fit, neither girls noticed that Weiss' briefcase was still left open and it was only too late once Ruby sneezed to 16 feet that the table the briefcase was on was kicked up by Ruby's hip and all the vials shattered upon impact on the floor and covered the towering Ruby as she accidentally inhaled the cloud of powdered Dust.

Ruby coughed as Weiss (after continuously backing up into the bathroom) wondered what would happen next once her now 18 feet partner stopped inhaling the rest of her Dust.

It didn't take too long before to Weiss' dismay, Ruby twitched and closed her eyes tightly as the itch got even worse, forcing Weiss to back up again and barely took two steps back before to her horror, realized she had backed up into the bathroom wall and ran to the other side of the bathroom curled into a ball and covered her ears, waiting for the inevitable explosion that she was sure would come!

"GA-ah~, aah~, a-aaah~, aaaah~ aaaaah~!"
11112.title: Achoo!

111121.content:
Weiss flinched as the explosion she had dreaded erupted the moment Ruby sneezed causing everything to shake and shatter the window, as well as the sound of crashing.

After the initial explosion and although shaken, Weiss slowly looked behind her and gasped when she saw a large (right) foot through the bathroom door, slightly damaging the shower! She then noticed that the bathroom wall where the cabinets are had cracked in multiple areas and immediately, Weiss realized Ruby's other foot was likely on the other side. And if she were to make an educated guess when compared to how big Ruby was at around 18 feet tall... then that must mean she may be over 24 feet now!

Stunned, Weiss stood back up as the reality of the current situation dawned on her, "Oh my... I-I'm trapped!"

Back in the Dorm

When Ruby finally sneezed, her eyes were shut closed when she rapidly grew much more than usual due to the added effects of her partner's remaining Dust. All she heard was a deafening explosion quickly followed by the sound of glass shattering and suddenly feeling very squeezed in.

She groaned as she sniffed in annoyance as the itch disappeared before she shook her head and slowly opened her eyes... she soon wished she had kept her eyes closed.

Ruby was stunned when she saw how tiny and cramped her Team's Dorm was now!

She winced when she realized she was in a bent forward position with most of her back and shoulders pressing against the ceiling, her breasts were pressed against her lower thighs, her butt pushing against their closet, and her left hip and legs had pushed her Team's bunk beds. This resulted in her sister's bunk crashing onto Blake's bed due to the books holding it up scattering due to either the explosion or Ruby's hip and leg slamming into the lower bed when she grew.

As for Ruby's own top (hanging) bed... two of the ropes had broken from the ceiling while the other two were somewhat holding it up. Her partner's bed was pushed by her hip and was slightly damaged from the hanging bed's two legs crashing into it.

Ruby then noticed that her right foot was also through the bathroom door while her left was pressed against the adjacent wall cracking it.

She gasped when she remembered that Weiss was still inside and soon heard Weiss' muffled cry that she was trapped! With some effort, she reached out and touched the wall in concern, "Weiss? Are you okay?"

Ruby waited with bated breath for her partner to respond and before long she did get a response as Weiss...
111121.title: Growsplosion... Literally!

choices: Still nothing happens yet. (Grows later the next day!)
11113.content:
"*cough* W-*cough* what kind of Dust was that?" Ruby coughed as the Dust slowly dissipated.

Weiss blinked as her mind tried to process an answer to her partner's question but, "Honestly... I don't know. It could either be a defective product, or it doesn't have any effect on people."

Though Ruby still occasionally coughed, she tried to dust off her clothes of any remaining Dust still on her. "Well *cough* that's good to know."

"Yes... with that out of the way... ahem! Ruby... we need to have a chat..."

Ruby froze and slowly looked up to see Weiss tapping her foot and crossing her arms with a frown on her face, "Uh oh!"

---

Several hours later...

It was late at night as the Team get into their beds and go to sleep to prepare for class tomorrow. All except for Ruby as she is still awake as she reflects on the aftermath of her rummaging through Wiess's briefcase. She winced as she recalls Weiss yelling at her for going through her Dust when she had explicitly told Ruby not to do so and now had to deal with one Dust short. Specifically; the unknown Dust.

Ruby frowned as she tried to figure out what kind of Dust it was and thankfully a visit to a clinic had cleared her of any issues. Still, she can't help but wonder as even Weiss (after calming down) did not know what that Dust was.

Ruby sighed, "Well, there's nothing I can do now and besides; we have class tomorrow."

With that, she covers her eyes with her sleep mask and drifted off to sleep.

As she slept...
11113.title: Go to Sleep

111131.content:
An hour after falling asleep, unknown to Ruby, she started to grow and her pajamas started to get tighter and stretch as she grew. Her trousers tightened around her legs and hips as her feet slid forward exposing some of her legs and slightly revealing her panties. Her tank top tightened around her growing upper body as the straps dug into her shoulders while exposing her stomach as the tank top and trousers got further and further away from each other as Ruby grew. Her sleep mask tightened around her head and her bra tightened against her chest causing Ruby to frown in discomfort but not enough to cause her to wake up.

Inch by inch Ruby grew as her feet nearly reached the end of her bead while her head slid up and bumped into the other side. All the while Ruby and her Team slept peacefully blissfully unaware of the changes happening to her. And...
111131.title: A Growing Sleeping Rose

1111311.content:
Ruby shifted in her bed as her clothes and mask continue to get tighter as she continued to grow. Her tank top stretched against her chest and widening body as the straps dug into her shoulders. Her trousers cuffs almost reached up to her ankles while her sleep mask tightened into her head making her more uncomfortable.

As she grew passed 6 feet her feet had almost reached the end of the footboard as her head, then shoulders are pushed against the headboard forcing Ruby into an awkward position with her head and neck hanging out over the board.

Then her pajamas began to tear open in certain places as it is now too small for her. Her trousers snapped at her hips, the middle of her tank top split slightly exposing her bra, and her mask strained to try to hold itself around her larger head before the strap snapped causing her mask to fall off to the side. Her feet finally touched the footboard end of her bed causing legs to be pushed to the sides before both of her legs and left arm were left dangling out onto the sides of her bed.

Though still asleep, Ruby's discomfort is very present on her face as her pajamas continue to rip and tear as she still grew. Neither her or her Team woke up even as her bed's ropes creaked as she grew. The only thing is though, would she keep growing or would it end for now?
1111311.title: Sleeping Growing Rose Pt.2

11113111.content:
Still asleep, and still growing. That was Ruby's situation unbeknownst to her as her body continued to grow and cause her pajamas to be ripped apart as she grew.

Her trousers opened up exposing her elastically stretched panties as they tighten around her lower areas while the cuffs began to rip and tear around her ankles, the middle split on her tank top grew exposing more of her now too small bra trying to contain her breasts. While still asleep the tightening of her underwear caused Ruby face to flush and unwillingly moan as she grew past 7 feet resulting in her bra snapping and falling off.

---

The sound was loud enough to stir Yang and Weiss but Blake's cat traits caused her to wake up with a startle, "What was that?"

"*groan* Blake... it's too early..." Blake heard her partner above her moaning. She was about to respond when her cat ears picked up more sounds coming from... Ruby's bunk?

Though a little cranky at being woken up so late at night Blake rubbed her eyes and thanks to her Faunus trait she was able to see the dark dorm. And what Blake saw when she turned to the source of the sounds shocked her, "What... the..."

She couldn't find her words as she stared at a 7 foot Ruby Rose! And she can clearly see that Ruby is growing even bigger! Then she heard a very audible creaking sound making Blake lean out to see where on Ruby's bed is making those sounds only to freeze when she saw the ceiling holding the ropes cracking!

"Oh no!" Blake scrambled off her bed rushed to Weiss' bed and frantically shook the heiress, "Weiss! Wake up!"

"Wha- Blake? What are you doing?!"

"No time! Just get off before you get hurt!"

Confused Weiss was about to retort when she noticed a rather large leg, as well as an arm, dangling from... Ruby's bunk.

"What-?" That was all she had to say before Blake literally dragged her off the bed. The noise also woke Yang up as she rubbed her now red eyes in irritation.

"What the hell is going on?"

Weiss stammered as she stared wide-eyed at her growing partner, "Y-Yang? Take a look at your sister."

Yang looked and suddenly she was no longer sleepy, "What the-?! Ruby?!"

Her eyes widen at the site of her "little sister" now over 7 and a half feet tall and completely naked as her tank top had been ripped open exposing her bare chest while her trousers have since broken apart exposing her now exposed lower area after her panties finally snapped off. Her arms and legs are now dangling off to the sides of her bed as her crotch slid closer to the footboard while her head and shoulders pressed against the adjacent wall propping her up. And her growing body's weight causes the ropes holding her bed to groan and creak causing the ceiling to crack!

Yang scrambled off her bunk bed and ran up to Ruby and shook her larger arm, "Ruby wake up! WAKE UP!!"

Ruby began to stir and...
11113111.title: Sleeping Growing Rose Part 3

choices: Stay in the Dorm until the Team comes back.
Reluctantly get ready for the School day.
11113112.content:
After a while, Ruby suddenly stopped growing at over 6'10", almost close to 7 feet tall! She then reshifted in her bed in a somewhat more comfortable position and continued to sleep unaware of what she and her Team were about to see when they all wake up in the morning.

Morning

6:00 am(ish)

*beep* *beep* *beep* *beep*

The sound of the Teams clock alarm caused all the girls to groan before Blake shuts it off. Ruby yawned and groaned as she knew that Monday had arrived

"I don't want to go to class today!", Ruby muttered as she pulls on her covers to cover herself up more... only to notice that something felt... off.

Groggily opening her eyes Ruby sat up and stretched-

*rip*

"Huh?"

Ruby blinked in confusion as she heard a ripping sound and then glanced down only to suddenly feel wide awake when she saw her cleavage and the ripped tank top!

"Wh- what the?!" She stammered before she threw her bedsheet away and gasped when she saw her pajama is now ripped and torn in several areas. That was when she finally noticed that her bed and the Dorm seemed... smaller.

Confused, Ruby hopped off her bed. But when she looked down, she suddenly felt dizzy when her perspective looked much higher than usual. This caused her to stumble and fall on her butt causing her to yelp.

Her yelp stirred her Team a bit as Weiss muttered, "Ruby... what are you doing?"

"Seriously sis, just a few more minutes okay?"

But Ruby, now wide awake, slowly stood up and looked around her Dorm in confusion, "Um... did everything shrink or something?"

A bit irritated, Yang sat up, "What on Remnant are you talking about sis? The room is..."

What every Yang was about to say disappeared when her eyes widened at the sight of her now really tall "little sister", "What, R-RUBY?!"

Ruby turned to her sister, and that was when she noticed that Yang also looked smaller as well. In fact, everything and everyone looked smaller to her! "What... what's going on? Why is everything smaller? Why are my pajamas like this?"

By now, Weiss and Blake had also woken up. At first, they were annoyed and grumpy at the noise the halfsisters were causing, only to freeze up in shock when they saw their now much taller leader.

"Ruby... it's not us that became small; you're bigger!" Blake exclaimed.

"What?! But, how?! How am I so big now?!"

Weiss said nothing as her mind raced in confusion until she recalled yesterday's incident, "... there's no way."

This caught the other three's attention, "Weiss, do you know why my sister is suddenly this tall?"

Weiss shifted uncomfortably, "I think... it may be because of what happened yesterday?"

"Yesterday?" Ruby parrotted in confusion before her eyes slowly widened. "You mean, the vial I accidentally dropped? The one that had that strange Dust?"

"I believe so."

Having been told of what happened with the "Dust incident", Blake and Yang glanced at each other before Blake asked, "Weiss, are you sure you don't know what that Dust even is? Or what it was supposed to be used for?"

The Schnee Heiress shook her head, "I asked my father if he knew what it was, but all he said that it was a prototype that I was to test it to see what it could do. However, he explained that there was supposed to be some information as well as instructions that came with the briefcase, but I told him that I did not see any."

Yang raised an eyebrow, "So your dad just forgot it or something?"

Weiss shrugged, "Apparently someone was supposed to supply me the info and have it in the briefcase, but had been misplaced somehow. So he had to... "discipline" the person before they had to either try to find it or just resend another copy."

Ruby, having calmed down somewhat, tilted her head, "Did they find it?"

At Weiss' sigh, the other girls knew the answer was a 'no'.

"As a result, they had to make another copy and it is supposed to arrive sometime today. Where I will likely would've retrieved it after School."

No one said anything for a while before Yang of all people voiced her concerns, "Well, what do we do? I mean, breakfast is about... *glances at their clock*" an hour away. And we, of course, have to go to class."

Ruby went pale at that, "What?! I can't go to class like this!"

Yang shook her head, "Ruby, we probably have no choice right now. But maybe we could ask Pyrrah if we could borrow her clothes for you to wear?"

"Wait!" Weiss suddenly yelled before she grabs a measuring tape to check how tall Ruby actually is. Only to blink when she read the result, "...I don't think Pyrrah's clothes can fit on you."

"...Weiss? How tall am I?"

"You are 6 feet 10 inches tall."

"That's nearly 7 feet!" Ruby mentally screamed as her situation became more problematic.

"Well... she could stay here until we get back. Maybe say that she got sick or something along those lines?" Blake suggested.

But Weiss shook her head, "I don't know... the whole school is bound to find out about her new height eventually. So, I hate to say this, Ruby may just attend class anyway just to get this over with now rather than later."

Yang glanced up at Ruby, "Your call sis. It's your decision."

Ruby looked down and shifted with uncertainty for a few minutes before she decided to...
11113112.title: Morning Surprise

choices: Stick with Ruby (Grows again at some point)
111131121.content:
After a few minutes, Ruby decided, "I'll skip classes today."

"Are you sure Ruby?" Blake asked.

"Yeah, I just... need to get used to, this." Ruby replied as she gestured to her body.

The other three nodded, suddenly towering almost everyone overnight is not something to get used to in a heartbeat. Though Weiss said that they will have to either come up with some cover story or explain Ruby's condition to an adult, (and likely have to show what said 'condition' is). Perhaps Professor Goodwitch or even Professor Peach.

Either way they also hope to figure out what the mysterious prototype Dust Weiss received the previous day was once the info arrives later.

Weiss crossed her fingers hoping that the information her father sent would properly arrive. Preferably earlier than usual given how her father decided not to send the info onto her Scroll but by a fast service delivery instead. All in an effort to "not leak this to any competitors" as he put it.

Said quote was not well received by her teammates, and she could not blame them. "It's always going to be about profits for the Company..." Weiss thought bitterly.

Several minutes later

After Yang finally finished cleaning up and use up so much precious time focusing on her hair she, Weiss, and Blake were all dressed up in their School uniforms, ready for the start of the School day. They glanced at Ruby, who is still in her now too small and torn pajamas.

"We'll try to come back and bring you something to eat during lunch. Okay?" Weiss explained/asked.

Ruby nodded, "Yeah, I'll see you guys later."

With that _WBY left and met up with their sister Team, JNPR, and had to explain that Ruby is "not feeling well". Said, now tall, silver-eyed girl had to move to the side a little bit to hopefully stay out of sight and then pretend to cough when JNPR asked if she's okay. "Uh, Yeah *cough* *cough*, I'll be fine. Go on ahead without me."

JNPR accepted and said their goodbye and hope that Ruby will feel better as Blake closes the door to her Team's Dorm. Ruby could still hear Nora give some crazy ideas as Ren sighed and bluntly turns them down as both Teams left together.

Ruby is now all alone as she sat down on the floor and sighed as she glances down at her torn pajamas, "What am I going to do now?"
111131121.title: Dorm Stay

choices: Find something to distract herself. (Grows at any moment)
First go the bathroom and use the shower. (Grows while showering)
Sleep it off. (Grows while she sleeps)
1111311211.content:
Ruby pondered, now that she is alone and won't see her Team for several hours until either during Lunch or after School is over for the day. Once again, Ruby sighed, "I hope we figure out what that Dust was."

She frowned, just what was that particular Dust supposed to be used for? It just does not make any sense that it caused her to grow so tall overnight. And Weiss did say that it was apparently a prototype. But, for what? What use is there for a Dust to make something grow bigger?

Ruby rubbed her head trying to come up with any ideas before giving up. "No use just sitting here." She glanced around the at Dorm, "I gotta use the time I now have until the Team gets back. Whenever that is."

Maybe she could find something to distract herself to pass the time? Perhaps watch TV or play some games? Sure in the case of the latter, her Scroll is now much smaller than what she is used to, but she's sure she can manage it. Hopefully.

Then again, she did not get to use the bathroom yet and it would be nice have a nice long shower. "Hopefully Yang did not use up all the hot water... *groan* again..."

Ruby remembered during one weekend when her sister used the shower first, but used it for a ridiculously long time. It was only after Weiss banged on the bathroom door and yelled at Yang to finish up already.

Needless to say, she, and Ruby were annoyed having a cool/cold shower (which led to a gods awful pun from Yang... again). Blake on the other hand simply left the room and borrowed JNPR's bathroom.

Ruby shook her head at that particular memory, "Whether it's at home, Signal, or Beacon... Yang really, really loves her hair..."

She sighed, find something or first take a, hopefully, warm shower.

But then, Ruby is supposed to be "sick". So maybe she should just sleep until her Team comes back?
1111311211.title: What is a Very Tall Rose to do now?

11113112112.content:
Author Note: Retconning one tiny detail

Ruby then made up her mind as she got up from the floor, "I guess I'll have a shower for now. Hopefully, there's still enough hot water left."

With that, Ruby walked towards the bathroom and entered it. Due to her new height, she had to slightly crouch down to enter. After she closed the bathroom door Ruby then glanced down at her torn pajamas and began to undress. She knew that her pajamas were going to be small now, but it was still annoying to try to take them off.

She first pulled down her trousers, and only had a minor difficulty thanks to her wider hips. Then she pulled up her tank top and the only issue she had was pulling it up over her head as she sighed after getting it off, "*sigh* If I was any taller I would've ripped that apart!"

Now, all that's left is her rather snug panties. Thankfully that was easy due to how elastic it was. Ruby is now completely naked as she puts her pajamas away on a cabinet. "I hope they're not as difficult to put back on... or any clothes we have anyway."

Ruby then sighed, she and her Team will have to deal with getting her new clothes later. As Ruby was about to head towards the shower, she paused as she glances at herself in the mirror. She crouched down a bit after seeing only her neck was in her view. Ruby saw that she still looks the same, just a lot taller than usual. She checked herself out in a bit of wonder at how everything looked much smaller and lower than what she was used to. Even grabbing a bottle of hand soap and marveled at the size difference as she recalled how it originally looked in her hand before she became so tall.

As she put the hand soap back, Ruby then frowned. Her mind was still on that unknown Dust that caused her to grow this much. No matter how much she tried, it did not make any sense why Weiss' dad would send her something that was experimental. Let alone the effects it had, on Ruby at least.

Ruby then spent a few minutes trying to come up with ideas about what use that Dust had. Maybe it was something for farming? Like increasing the size of fruits and vegetables? Then again, would it even work on plants anyway? If it is for farming, then the only other possibility is animals. She drooled a bit at the thought of table-sized cooked meat that would make for a great feast with both Team's RWBY & JNPR. Maybe even have some room for more people to join in.

Then Ruby's stomach growled loudly, causing her to blush, "Aww man... they're about to have breakfast by now..."

She sighed, there was nothing she could do now as she walked towards the shower and turns it on. Ruby then checked the temperature and thankfully the water was still warm and felt the temperature rise a bit. In response, she readjusted the valve and managed to get the right temperature she wanted and entered.

Ruby sighed in relief for a moment until she once again noticed the height difference as the cascade of water hits her chest instead of her head. She grumbled as she once again bent down a bit and starts washing, "Being tall sucks!"

It is a sunny weekend and since classes are not in session, one particular black and red clothed girl is bored out of her mind, “I’m bored!” Ruby Rose exclaimed lying on Weiss’s bed in her Team ’s dorm.

The rest of her team had plans of their own for the day; her partner Weiss went to the CCT for “family matters”, Blake went to a new bookstore that was just recently opened and Yang... well, Ruby had no idea what her half-sister is up to other than casually saying she needed to train more.

As Ruby pondered on what to do next, her stomach suddenly growled!

“Well, I guess that answers my question.” Ruby said with a blush as she got off the bed and headed out to mess hall and see if there is something to eat.

When Ruby finally arrived and entered the mess hall she wasn’t surprised that no one was inside at the moment, meaning the few weekend faculty kitchen staff were likely out in the City of Vale for whatever their own reasons were.

Regardless, Ruby smiled as she skipped to the kitchen and before long she was in front of the refrigerator.

“Let’s see what’s inside.” She said as she opened the refrigerator door and took a look.
Inside there were a few different kinds of food neatly arranged but her eyes lit up as she quickly locked onto a plastic container filled with cookies topped with chocolate ships and *gasp* strawberries!

112331122221.content:
It didn’t take much to change reality, or her backstory for that matter.

Ruby Rose, and her older sister, Yang Xiao Long, were among the first. Nobody knew what had caused it, being overuse of dust, just natural human evolution, or a weird mutation, but the two girls, despite being born only slightly larger than the average baby, began to grow in height and muscularity at an incredible rate. By age 3 both girls were five feet tall and packed with muscles. By age ten they were fifteen feet tall, walking hulks that their father had to walk on eggshells to ensure they wouldn’t seriously hurt others whenever they played.

This immense power, still not widespread among the populace, had the authorities of Beacon take a keen interest in the two girls, particularly after an incident where Ruby Rose stopped a robbery of Dust with nothing but her bare hands. And so, the two sisters were sent off to the institute to master their power along with other notable specimens, both human and Faunus. The world’s scientists had dubbed them “Gigants”, a new subspecies whose presence would become more common as generations passed, but were still fairly uncommon as the world of the “little people” hastily attempted to adjust for their giant, super muscled forms. And while Beacon had a fairly substantial Gigant population, most of the students were still regular sized people in the shadows of these colossi.

Smiling at the backstory she had come up with, Ruby began to change herself and others. She was willing to give this power to others, but she would be the strongest, naturally.

So while there were some impressive Gigants on campus, like their friend Jaune, a 25 foot tall hulk of a boy whose clumsiness and good heart endeared himself to Ruby (even if he was awkward as anything around girls still, Ruby making sure to not change the personality aspects of the boy too greatly lest he turn into a jerk) they still weren’t nearly as powerful as Yang and Ruby. Yang was 30 feet of power and femininity, with massive breasts, a butt to die for, and enough muscles on her frame to lift up an entire mountain. She was always using Beacon’s Gigant sized workout equipment to push her power to new limits, and her body showed the results of this exercise, with definition complimenting her sheer bulk.

And yet she was dwarfed by her not-so-little sister, a 40 foot tall titan (who may still be growing, in case Ruby ever felt like she deserved to be even bigger) with muscular size that gave her the most incredible figure. Long, massive legs that could crush anything between them into powder, and crush anyone beneath them into paste. A chest that effortlessly held up her enormous shelf of a bust as it stuck out with no effort. Arms that could hold up an entire city without feeling much strain. Hips and a behind that would hypnotize any man fortunate enough to gaze upon their massive shapes. And still the cutest face on top of it all.

Ruby smiled at the changes she had made to the world, and to herself, before adding three final details. The first was that the world had made it a point to get stretchable material for Gigants to wear lest they hulk out of their clothes on a regular basis. To that end Ruby was wearing a workout outfit, a T-shirt and booty shorts that left nothing to the imagination. The second was that Gigant spurts were sudden and dramatic, able to occur, well, whenever Ruby saw fit.

The final detail was that the little people were in awe or fear of the Gigants, as Ruby’s two bullies from earlier, in this reality, bragged about their strength until they saw the colossus in front of them, at which point they cried and begged to not be squashed. Lucky for them, Ruby was content with seeing the two braggarts shake in fear whenever she walked by.

With this taken care of, the new queen of the Gigants stomped back to Beacon with her enormous hips swaying to and fro, thinking about what kind of team would be there to greet her. Oh sure, her sister had to get in on the power, but what of her other teammates?

11233112222122.content:
With a spring in her earthshaking step, Ruby Rose headed back to the campus grounds to see what her changes had done. With the new “reality” of sorts filling in the blanks to the circumstances she had introduced, Ruby remembered she was looking for a spot for the team to practice that wouldn’t put little people in danger, lest some random practice maneuvers result in her or Blake squashing an unfortunate little. The others were probably wondering what took her so long.

Speaking of, Ruby began to piece together the backstories for the other members of her team. Blake was still a cat Faunus with a quiet, aloof personality, but now she was 27 feet tall and almost as muscular as Yang, with her massive frame accentuating her entire body, particularly hips and legs that could send her flying forward like a bullet. Slowly but surely she was warming up to the other members of the team, and while it was subtle, it was clear she was happy to be around people her own size, and Beacon gave her the opportunity to see other Gigants, something that wasn’t present in her life before she came.

That of course, left Weiss. Teeny, tiny, Weiss. Like Blake and Jaune, Ruby didn’t want to change aspects of her personality or backstory, otherwise it wouldn’t be the Weiss she remembered. Weiss, unlike the others, wasn’t a Gigant, but one of the little people. She believed that she was the strongest and most capable of all of the students present, but was quickly rid of that belief when Ruby picked her up between two fingers the first day they met. (Not in a mean way, she reasoned to herself, but a curious one). Being the smallest among a team of gigantic, muscled huntresses in training had made Weiss focus intently on her studies, while trying to grapple with the feeling of being physically outclassed in every way.

And according to her own rewrite, they were waiting for her at the front gate. Weiss standing at the feet of Blake and Yang, who both were wearing the same tight of Gigant-friendly workout clothes as Ruby, clothes that complimented their enormous sizes, and made Weiss’ prim and proper outfit seem even more out of place. Little people would occasionally get a look at the two shapely Gigants before quickly moving to keep out of their way.

“There you are,” Yang said. “You were gone all morning. I was starting to wonder what happened.”

“Oh come on Yang, you know I’m a big girl. I can take care of myself. It was just harder than normal to find a spot to practice. But I found one!”

“Well we better get going then,” Yang said. “We’ve only got a few hours before the afternoon lecture.” Blake nodded in agreement, before extending her hand to the comparatively tiny Weiss.

“Really?”

“It’s quicker this way,” Blake said. “Remember when you tried walking to keep up with us and almost got lost in the forest?”

“Don’t remind me,” Weiss said with a groan as she accepted the boost.

“Well then,” Ruby said, “Let’s go!” She couldn’t wait to see the dynamic of her team with their new scales in place.

The trip to the training spot was fairly quiet, but at the same time, fascinating to Ruby. Due to its substantial Gigant population, a specific section of road was kept aside for little pedestrians and vehicles on an elevated surface so they would be more easily noticed by passing Gigants. Naturally Gigants had most of the road to themselves, walking muscled towers that no little would dare try to impede lest they be crushed underfoot. The only way to travel on a Gigant road would be like Weiss was doing reluctantly, being perched on Blake’s shoulder safe from the girls’ thumping feet.

“Ruby!”

But besides that, it was a regular road, and judging by the sound, it meant others could catch up to them.

“Phyrrha? What are you doing here?”

The 29 foot tall redhead with muscles big enough to upend a small town and chuck it into orbit smiled as she began to slow her pace and walk alongside the others. She was wearing the same T-shirt and short combination as the others, only in the colors of her armor from before the changes were made.

“I was looking for somewhere to train with Jaune. Our old spot was a bit too close to some little people houses and they filed a noise complaint with Beacon.”

“Lucky for you, we found a spot!” Ruby proudly declared. “Follow me!”

The P in Team JNPR smiled at the girls as she walked alongside them, while Ruby, unknown to the others present, subtly began to fill in her backstory. Unlike Team RWBY, only half of Team JNPR were Gigants, her and Jaune. Phyrrha was helping Jaune get his skills up to snuff in private, the boy’s natural strength from being a Gigant with muscles comparable to anyone save Ruby (But no force in the world was going to be as big or muscular as she was), and useful, if not flashy Semblance, was hampered by his distinct lack of skill in using that power. Luckily he had a great tutor and a drive to learn everything that he admittedly should have known before coming to Beacon.

It was also clear to anyone save the thickheaded boy that Pyrrha had a thing for Jaune, and Ruby was happy to show them a space they could be alone. She couldn’t have been the only one who thought they would make a cute couple.

“I appreciate it Ruby,” Phyrrha said, her muscles idly flexing as she walked with the girls.

“It’s nothing, really,” Yang said. “Gigants should look out for each other, right?”

“I suppose you’re right. It’s still annoying when you think you’ve found a spot, only to find out that it’s too close to an area with little people.”

“You shouldn’t blame yourself,” Blake said. “It’s not our fault their buildings and bodies can be so fragile.” Turning to Weiss, she offered a quick, but sincere “sorry.” Weiss said nothing, but it was clear that she was bothered by the huge women speaking so dismissively of normal sized people despite her best attempts to hide it.

“Well just know that we’re happy to share!” Ruby said. “As long as we haven’t called dibs on the place first.”

“Thank you.”

“Well we’re almost there!” Ruby said. “Let’s go!”
11233112222122221.title: Phyrrha

112331122221222211.content:
The group of huntresses had reached the training grounds and set about getting ready to train.
While everyone was doing some sort of warm up exercise , Ruby felt kind of bummed that the rest of team JNPR wasn't here with them.
Fortunately that was easily remedied.
A quick use of her semblance later and The massive form of Jaune appeared entering the clearing with Ren and Nora sitting on either one of his shoulders .
“ Jaune you're here!” Ruby shouted happily, making sure her voice didn't reach earth shaking levels.
The scraggly haired boy returned the massive girl's greeting with a smile of his own.
“ Hey Ruby! We were just getting some last minute preparations done before we met up with Pyrrha to train. It looks like we all had the same idea.”
“Looks like it!” the scarlet colossus giggled.
Nora Jumped up from her seat.
“ Come on! Lets get going! I wanna see some giants flex!!!” the hammer wielder punctuated this statement with a crab flex.
Ren didn't say anything, maintaining his calm demeanor.

Everyone began doing various exercises.

Yang was doing one armed push ups while carrying massive boulders on her back.
Blake was practicing with Some kind of new technique involving her duplication semblance.
Jaune and Pyrrha were going through some combat drills and refreshing themselves on their fundamentals.
And Weiss, Nora, and Ren were sparring with each other.
Ruby found the sight quite enjoyable, everyone just working and training together, But she knew what would make this moment even better.
She focused on her semblance, playing the trump card she made when she created this scenario.
The colossal girl felt her body fill with a pleasant warmth, energy suffusing every cell in her body.

Then she grew.

Ruby cooed as her muscles bulked up, doubling and tripling in size and beyond.
Her curves ballooned from their already massive size to even more absurd levels.
And finally her towering form inched up higher and higher to dizzying new heights.
Pleasure coursed through her being, her moans shook the very land increasingly more intense as she gained in size.

“So……..good!” the silver eyed giantess gasped out.
Ruby let out a sigh of satisfaction as she basked in the after glow of the growth spurt.
Looking down at herself, she saw that she had grown to 120 feet of height, three times what she was before!
This put a smile on Ruby's face.
She also noticed that she was in nothing but her bright red underwear, not that she cared.

The sound of loud moans and stretching clothes caught the Titaness's attention, her fellow Gigants were finishing up their own growth spurts.

While Yang was trying to finish off her 200th set, the familiar sensation of an oncoming growth spurt filled her being.
“More *grunt* power huh? Alright then, GIVE IT TO ME!! “
Her push ups became faster and faster as the boulders seemed to shrink on top of her back and her rapidly expanding tits a great cushion beneath her, her grunts of effort became intermingled with groans of pleasure that made the earth quake and rumble even harder.

Blake stopped mid sword swing from the clearly sexual sounds her partner was making only to double over as the very same sensations overcame her.
“ A-Another spurt? And it's so powerful too!”
The Black cat faunus's body stretched upwards while her hips, thighs, and ass piled on more and more mass along with her muscles.
It was all she could do to keep herself from raising her own voice into Rumbling cries of ecstasy.
Much like their fellow Gigants, Jaune and Pyrrha were preoccupied with their own growth.
The white knight's impervious pectorals became even more massive and even his junk swelled outwards wildly.
The Spartan's mighty back widened alongside her bulking shoulders while her ass grew thicker and firmer from expanding glutes.
And both of their bodies grew taller and taller. They didn't bother to stifle their moans

All while this was happening, the three little people watched in awe at the spectacle, with a little bit of worry thrown in in Weiss's case, she had never seen so many Gigants experience a spurt in the same place before and never this greatly either.
The growth spurt would eventually Peter out with the Gigants standing at their monstrous new statures.
By the heiress’s best assessments, she figured that Ruby, Yang , Blake, Pyrrha, and Jaune were now 120, 79, 72, 76, and 75 Feet in height respectively.
She also noticed that their clothes were pulled so taut across their bodies that they appeared in danger of snapping off and left nothing to the imagination, her face became beet red when she saw that her leader was wearing nothing but a Red bra and panties, also being stretched to their limits.


Every Gigant present was admiring their new bodies with wonder and curiosity at the new depths of power that they possessed.
“Oh yeah, I'm definitely digging this!” Yang said as she flexed both of her arms in a double bicep pose.
Blake gave her behind a good shake.
“ I'd have to agree.”
Pyrrha flexed her massive lats in a double bicep pose of her own.
“More power is always welcome!”
Jaune stood there making his pecs bounce in a side chest pose with a self satisfied smile on his face.

A great shadow was cast upon them at moment.
They all looked up to see the Half naked hulking form of Ruby looming over them.
The scarlet girl smiled down at them, basking in their looks of awe
They the four smaller Gigants stood there astonished by the silver eyed colossus's sheer size, the fact that she was in only her underwear compounded this.
The two boys blushed at the sight only for JNPR’s Amazon to cover the blonde knight’s eyes while Nora bopped Ren on the head.
Meanwhile Yang walked up to her sister while Weiss looked on mortified and Blake blushed heavily.
“ Wow. Guess growing so much bigger than everyone else can have its down sides Huh.” The blonde brawler said motioning towards the Crimson haired girl’s indecent state.
Ruby just waved it off.
“ I don't really mind. Besides, it's a crime to cover up a body like this!”
Ruby punctuated this statement with a single flex of her right arm, the bicep bulged to immense proportions.
This caused Yang to chuckle.
“What ever your say Rubes.”
The blonde brawler went back to her feline partner's side and started talking to her all the weights she could probably lift now.
Ruby felt seemingly boundless energy course through her veins, she felt as though she could carry the entire world on her shoulders .
And yet, she wanted more.
The only problem was that she already used the “Gigant spurt" card and couldn't use it again so soon after the fact without it creating suspicion.
She wracked her brain for a solution.
Suddenly, she got an idea.
A very awesome idea.
Once more that day, she focused on her semblance and made a few more adjustments to the timeline.
Ruby opened her eyes and found that nothing had appeared to have changed but just to make sure.
“Hey guys. Remember my semblance?”
Yang turned to face her.
“You mean the thing that allows you to alter the form, traits, and properties of stuff at will? Yeah, what of it?”
Ruby's grin seemed to threaten to split her face, which made most everyone present quite concerned.
“Well I've been working my butt off for while now training with it and I'm proud to say that I've reached a new level of power over my semblance!” Ruby declared with pride in her voice.
This got everyone's attention.
“That's awesome Ruby! Show us what you got.”
Ruby had to think for a second on how to demonstrate her power.
Her face twisted into a very suggestive grin when a very lewd idea came to her.
112331122221222211.title: Alter power!!!

choices: Ruby uses her alter power to create an obstacle course.
1123311222212222111.content:
The Titaness stood up to her full height and placed her hands while sticking her chest out in a deliberately provocative manner, an act that made everyone present raise their Eyebrows.
A few seconds passed with nothing happening at first, then something incredible happened.

To everyone’s ,except Ruby's, shock, the Goliath girl’s already absurdly large tits suddenly and very visibly swelled in size before the group's very eyes.
The crimson haired huntress’s bra, already strained to its limits, finally snapped and flew off into distance, leaving her breasts flop against her armor-like abdomen.
The titanic mammaries grew until they reached slightly past the scarlet behemoth’s knees before petering out.
Ruby's eyes twinkled with mirth at the reactions she received from her teammates.
Yang stood there baffled by the spectacle.
“ Whoa…..that uh, really is an improvement.” The blonde brawler finally said, Blake silently nodded in agreement.
Jaune stared slack jawed at the sight of the expansive tits not expecting something like this to happen today, the corner of his mouth curled up slightly which did not go unnoticed by Pyrrha.
The three little people had varying reactions with Ren bulging his eyes out, Nora smiling with barely contained glee, and Weiss being shocked and completely mortified by the sheer brazenness of her leader’s actions.

“Those are some huge knockers!!!” the energetic hammer shouted bluntly.
Ren nodded in agreement. “ they sure are….” The quiet monk drifted off.
Weiss felt like she was going to burst a vessel.
“R-R-Ruby! H-How can you be so indecent! And how is this even possible!?” Weiss stuttered out.
Ruby just grinned.
“impressed?”
She didn't wait for her ice themed teammate continue.
“Well if you thought that was great then get a load of this!!!”
Ruby focused on her alteration power for the second time for an even greater effect.
This time she made her entire body grow all at once!
She rose higher and higher with seemingly no end in sight.
Eventually though, she finally did stop and when she did she stood over 600 feet tall!
Now possibly the largest creature on the planet, she towered over everything around her , even her fellow Gigants didn't come up to her knees!
Ruby felt incredible, invincible!
though she could already do anything, now she felt like it!
She noticed that she was completely nude now.
“Whoops.” Ruby mentally chuckled.
The silver eyed colossus looked down from her God-like perspective to find her friends completely floored by her “new found mastery” over her semblance, much to her amusement.
“Holy shit….” Yang succinctly stated.
Everyone nodded in agreement.

Ruby was having a blast!
With her new “alter power" she could get away with so many shenanigans without drawing suspicion.
But now, how to test her new powers?
For the second time that day, she got what she considered a very awesome idea.
She crouched her monumental form down in front of her friends in order to better look them in the eyes.
“Hey guys. I have an idea of how we can test out our new bodies.” She said with mischievous glint in her eyes.
“And what would that be?” Yang asked more than a little intimidated, though she did well to hide the fact.

Ruby smiled widely.
“A contest of strength and skill! Where we compete in a series of challenges designed to test our new limits!” the titanic girl declared theatrically.
“Oh and before you ask, I will not be participating in these games directly.” Ruby added realizing the inherently unfair advantage she would have.
Yang was still feeling very much overwhelmed by what was happening but she couldn't lie to herself about not feeling curious.
“Okay then. Let's say we all agreed to playing this game of yours. What would you be doing?” asked Yang, unsure of what Ruby's role in all this would be.
Ruby just continued to smile at them with that playful look in her eyes.
“ Don’t worry, I have a few ideas.” The scarlet huntress answered cryptically.
Ruby readjusted her position slightly which had the effect of causing a minor earthquake to shake the forest.
“ so what do you guys say?”

Yang turned to the rest of her fellow Gigants.
“ Even though I find this whole thing very strange , I can't say I don't find the idea of a contest interesting. What do you guys think? It might even be fun.”
The other Gigants spent a few minutes considering the pros and cons of such an offer before finally settling on a decision.
“If you're going to participate, then I'm game" Said Blake, still very much unsure about the whole thing.
Pyrrha was on the fence about it but agreed as well.
“ this does sound interesting so I'll give it a try!”
Jaune simply shrugged.
“ I'll take a crack at it.”
Ruby brought her hands together with glee.
“ Excellent! Let's get started right away!” she exclaimed happily.
Before she could do anything however, Nora piped up from down below.
“Now wait just one darn second! You guys can't start a game and not include us!” Nora shouted , speaking for her fellow little people who didn't ask for it.
Nora continued her righteously indignant tirade before they could stop her though.
“You think just because you guys have bigger bods you can just dismiss us? That's discrimination!” Nora declared in a accusatory tone.

Ruby took a moment to consider what the hammer wielder said.
“You know what? Your right!”
Ruby once more donned a look of concentration.

The three little people watched the Crimson Gigant’s furrowed expression wondering what she intended to do.
They were caught off guard when a strange warmth suddenly spread throughout their bodies .
Nothing seemed to happen at first, but when their clothes started to feel uncomfortably tight, it became apparent to them what was happening.

They were growing bigger!
Almost as if in response to their collective revelation, the growth began to accelerate!
The bodies larger and larger while the three hunters looked on in disbelief.
They also noticed that they weren't just growing in size but also in musculature as well!
Along with other things.

Eventually, their growth began to slow down before stopping all together.
Both Nora and Ren now both stood at 74 feet tall while Weiss stood at 75 and all three of them were now unbelievably muscular and were possessed of truly exaggerated sexual characteristics.
They were also only in their underwear, Ruby remembered to grow those as well at the last second.
Her fellow Gigants gawked at such a display of power.
The three former little people had mixed responses .
Ren felt thoroughly dumbfounded by his transformation while Nora was completely enamored by it.
Meanwhile Weiss was predictably having a breakdown.

“Holy crap this is awesome!”
Nora said excitedly while performing a series of poses in her bright pink bra and panties.
Ren stood there in his emerald boxers in silent awe not really paying attention to what the hyper active girl was saying .
On the other hand Weiss was hastily trying, and failing, to cover up herself and her stylized ice blue underwear.

“ W-W-W-WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO US RUBY!?”
Weiss boomed, causing massive earthquakes to shake the entire forest all the way to the School grounds and even the city and causing massive fissures appear all over the landscape.
Weiss quickly clamped her hand over her mouth.

Ruby Beamed at the trio.

“I turned you all into Gigants.” She said matter-of-factly.

Weiss looked up at Ruby in mind twisting disbelief .
“Y-YOU CAN JUST DO THAT!?”
Weiss once again boomed, causing yet another earthquake to tear through the land and creating even more fissures.
She clamped her mouth shut again.

“Yep!” Ruby said nonchalantly.
Weiss stood in place in a stupefied posture.
This was insane.

The crimson haired Titaness stood up to her full towering height.
She grinned down at her friends with her hands on her fertility idol like hips.

“ Now that that's settled, lets get started!”
1123311222212222111.title: Alter power!!! Continued.
