112331122221222211122.title: Race to the top.

choices: Can’t slack off now, back to it
Ruby decides that’s enough for one day, head back to campus
112331122221222213.content:
The clearing they had found to practice in was dead in the middle of the forest, with roving packs of Grimm and wild animals by the area. It made any little person sized exploration extremely dangerous for the unskilled, but for the girls it amounted to a slight annoyance from small rodents. Other than that, it was an ideal workout ground, varied terrain, lots of sunlight for those tall enough to not be overshadowed by the trees, and plenty of space. Pyrrha appeared to be impressed as well, breathing in the air with a smile. The only one who seemed concerned was Weiss, whose discomfort with being among Gigants was starting to peak, her attempts to hide it failing as the girls warmed up.

For some reason, this reaction made Ruby giggle, not because she disliked Weiss, but because it was interesting to see the prideful and composed heiress clearly out of her element. In fact, seeing it made Ruby think of the last change to the world that she was keeping in her pocket just for a situation like this.

She had gotten a taste of how dramatically the world had changed due to her and her friends increased height and muscles, and now she wanted more. More size, more muscle, and more power to accentuate the difference between Gigants and little people.

So while the team and their guest were warming up with sparring, Yang suddenly stopped, bending over slightly. Blake and Phyrrha were next to follow, with Ruby feeling the effects last. Back on campus, the other Gigants, such as Jaune, were also likely feeling the start of what was coming.

“Ooooh!” Yang said, but her face showed no discomfort. Instead she showed a wide grin, feeling her muscles engorge and her body expand. “More power!”

“Another spurt?” Blake asked. “It feels...pleasant.”

“Pleasant, but powerful,” Phyrrha said. “I don’t think they’ve ever come on this strong before!”

Ruby was lost in the pleasure of the spurt she had started, feeling herself engorge and expand. It was transcendent in a bizarre way, as there became more of her. More size, more muscles, and just more of her body. It must have been how an animal felt after shedding its skin, or after a caterpillar emerged from a cocoon to become a butterfly. She was leaving her old, smaller self behind and emerging as something bigger and better.

“So...strong!” Was all she could say as her body expanded to new proportions.

Meanwhile on the ground, Weiss’ discomfort turned into full blown fear as she saw her friends grow even larger. She knew that Gigant spurts were unpredictable, and she had seen them during her time at Beacon, but never this many, this close, and above all, this much. She began to feel like a bug in comparison.

Finally, the spurts had finished, and luckily for the girls, their attire had performed in its job admirably, stretching to the limit but keeping the Gigants and their new scales clothed. Yang was the first one to look at her new body, clearly impressed by what she saw.

“Whoa, check these guns out!” Yang cheered as she flexed her enormous arms. “I’ve gotta be at least twice as big as before!”

“It looks like we’ve all more than doubled in size,” Blake said, looking on at her monolithic legs and huge hips. “Both in height, and in muscle.”

“Does this happen every time you come out here?” Phyrrha asked as she looked on at her new frame, flexing a back that was powerful enough to hold the entirety of the campus on it. “Because we will run out of room at Beacon quickly.”

“Somehow I doubt it,” Yang said, as she continued to flex, hearing her voice reverberate with a deeper but still undeniably feminine tone. “Too bad though, I’m even bigger than Ruby.”

“SORRY YANG,” Ruby’s voice bellowed before she adjusted it, looking down at the others before going into a crab flex to show off her enormous upper body. “I’m still the BIG sister.”

“Big is right,” Blake joked. Using the trees as a guideline, the estimate of the girls more than doubling their size was correct. Yang had gone from 30 to 69 feet, her from 27 to 62, Phyrrha from 28 to 66, and Ruby from 40 a whopping 92 feet tall. Their muscle mass had also proportionally increased, complimenting their figures while making them appear unmatched in power.

“Huh, don’t suppose you’ll ever let me the bigger one,” Yang joked.

“Nope!”

The girls all laughed, deep bellowing laughs that shook the forest and made Weiss feel even smaller at their feet. Looking up at the girls, she did her best to not show fear.

“That was...something alright.”

“Something great!” Yang said, flexing an astronomical bicep.

“Yeah, sure. But after that, should we get back to training?”
112331122221222213.title: Ruby gives everyone another boost

choices: The challengers make the first move
1123311222212222131.content:
“Alright girls lets get back to it!” Ruby shouted excitedly, unintentionally shaking the surrounding forest as she did. Her fellow Gigants returned her enthusiasm with nods of confirmation. Meanwhile poor Weiss found herself knocked down on the ground with her ears ringing from her leader's earthshaking voice. At this point Wiess was regretting not declining her roommate's offer to train with them. It was obvious to anyone watching that she was clearly out of her depth But Nooooo, she just HAD to prove that she could keep up! “Damn my stupid pride.” The Schnee heiress thought to herself.
Meanwhile Ruby thought of a brilliant idea to have some fun.
“ Hey guys You know what I'm thinking?” the red tinted asked with a playful glint in her eyes.
Yang recognized that look. It was the same look the towering teen wore whenever she was planning something mischievous.
“No… what are you thinking?” the blonde brawler responded cautiously.
Ruby’s face split into a wide grin. “I'm thinking we break in our new bods with a little sparring match!” the scarlet huntress exclaimed, she was itching to give her body a test drive after all the changes she made.
Her fellow classmates on the other hand did not share her enthusiasm, responding to her suggestion with exasperated sighs and groans.
“ Awww come on guys! I really want to see what we are capable of now!” Ruby whined.
Her teammates were having none of it though.
“Fat chance sis! We've been down this road before and I'm not gonna waste my time.” The blonde bombshell said in a voice used to her sister's antics.
“Yang's right Ruby, you'd just win as usual.” Blake said as she cleaned the dirt off her weapons (she would have to have them readjusted to her new size later)
“ I tend to have to agree with the others. I’m not really in the mood to get flattened by the "Queen of the Gigants.” The Spartan warrior quoted.
“ You guys are no fun!” Ruby pouted with her arms crossed over her massive chest like a little kid who was told she wouldn't get to have her favorite candy. The sight was actually pretty comical considering her titanic physique.
“Ok how about this? You guys can team up against me and are allowed to use any tactic and method you see fit. In fact I won't even move from this spot.” Ruby tried to reason with them.
“Ruby-"
“Ok fine! I’ll make you a deal. If you can make me move from this spot I do what ever menial tasks you decide to give me for a month!” The silver eyed huntress bargained.
“I really don't think this is a good idea.” The eldest xiaolong sibling said, doubt evident in her voice.
“Oh come on! It's not like anyone's going to get seriously injured right? I'll make sure if it!
As she said this she made a another change to reality. She granted herself the ability to increase the durability of anyone or anything she wills to astronomical levels which she now passes off as her semblance.

Yang looked unsure of herself. “ I don't know Rubes…”

“Pllleeeaase?” Ruby pleaded, giving her friends the most pathetic puppy dog eyes she could muster.
The three smaller gigants spent the next three minutes weighing the pros and cons of their leader/friend's proposal before finally coming to a decision.
Yang shrugged ”Ah what the hell I'll give it a shot. Your on Rubels! What do you guys say?” Yang motioned towards the other two gigants who were still on the fence about this whole thing.
Ruby looked pleadingly into their eyes.

Blake hesitated for a few seconds before finally coming to a decision . “ Well If Yang's ok with it then I guess I'll join in too.”
The three massive maidens turned toward Pyrrha.
Confronted by her classmates expectant gazes, the Mistral champion let out a sigh.
“ If I’m out voted then I guess I’ll play along.” The Spartan girl stretched her arms over her head to work out any kinks, giving a magnificent display of her mighty rack and abs as she did.
“ I could use the work out anyway.”
“Oh thank you, thank you, thank you!” Ruby shouted ecstatically, clapping her hands and jumping up and down like the schoolgirl she was. Incidentally as she was doing she was once again causing small earthquakes. Weiss, having just recovered from her previous spill was once again thrown for a loop as the very earth shook with enough force to violently throw her to the ground.
Ruby was about to get started with the sparring session when she remembered something important.
“ Crap I almost forgot!” the young huntress stomped her way towards her little friend's position and crouched down before her.
Weiss was picking herself off the ground for the second time this morning when she was startled by the vast shadow that was suddenly cast upon her. Weiss craned head up to meet the gaze of her first friend and leader, which was partially obscured by her titanic tits.
“ Hey Weiss! me and the girls are going to spar for a bit and since it might be troublesome for you considering the disparity between our sizes, I don't mind if you decide to sit this one out.” Ruby said, trying to be considerate of her comparatively tiny friend.
Weiss's mind was in a buzz.“Alright,this is your chance to leave Weiss! She's given you an out. You don't have anything to prove so just take it and leave!”
“No!! I will Not “ Sit this one out" Ruby Rose!” Weiss cried out in righteous indignation.
Beacon’s resident ice queen dug her heels into the ground. “ I will prove to you and everyone here that I am more than capable of pulling my weight on this team!!!!
“Gods damn it Weiss!!”she internally cursed at herself.
Ruby gave the heiress an incredulous look. “Are you sure about this?” the crimsonette inquired.
“Yes I'm very sure.” Weiss answered firmly.
Ruby was not convinced. “Are you rrrreeeaaally sure?”
“Yes! yes I'm sure! Just get on with it already you dolt!” Weiss shouted angrily in annoyance.
Ruby stared at the icy girl for a good before eventually shrugging.
“Suit yourself.” Ruby got up and made her way to her position for the exercise.
As Weiss observed the hypnotic sashay her leader's titanic hips and ass, she was already regretting her admittedly foolhardy decision.
“What have I gotten myself into this time?” The Icy huntress mumbled to herself.

A few minutes later and everyone is in their agreed upon positions, assuming battle stances.
Ruby meanwhile stands before her opponents triumphantly with her hands on her hips.
The Titaness smirked down at them. “All right. Lets get this started!!”
1123311222212222131.title: Gigantic brawl!

choices: Ruby starts to lose her balance!  It worked!
Ruby doesn’t even budge!  This is going to end badly for Yang and Phyrrha!
11233112222122221311.content:
Before the girls all got into position, Yang spoke with her group, trying their best to figure out a strategy.

“We can’t go toe to toe with Ruby to move her, especially now that she’s even bigger. If we’re going to have chance against her, we need to hit her from all angles and try and surprise her.”

“There’s four of us and one of her,” Weiss said from her perch on Blake’s shoulder. “What we should do is create a distraction in the front. Blake and I are ideal for that with out semblances. Then you two, as the strongest here, each go for one of her legs. If you two ram into them at the same time, you should be able to knock her over right on that huge, huge, huge...”

“Uh, Weiss?” Blake asked, worried that something had come over their little partner. While she had nothing against the heiress, and appreciated her help with studies, she was more than a bit worried about a little person trying to go head to head with a Gigant, despite her insistence on training with her massive team members.

“Sorry,” Weiss said, clearing her throat. “Anyway, if both Yang and Phyrrha attack while Ruby is distracted, your new bodies should have enough power to knock her right over, and out of her little circle.

“It’s as good as plan as we’ve got,” Phyrrha said.

Now, with everyone in position, the four girls looked on at the grinning titaness; hands on her hips as she waited for the assault. Unfortunately for Weiss, the little huntress realized exactly what the physical difference was between her and Ruby, causing her to shake in terror.

Ruby was unaware of the girls plans, or Weiss’ immense regret about agreeing to spar with Gigants that had grown larger than a six story building for little people. She was filled with a giddy energy, wanting to see just how much raw power she now had in comparison to her teammates. The thought caused her to giggle, which was the final straw for Weiss’ resolve.

“AHHHH!”

“Weiss, wait!” Blake shouted, but it was too late. The heiress had leapt forward as quickly as her legs and glyph could take her, propelling her like a bullet into the air as she prepared to strike with as many attacks as her weapon and glyphs would allow. Unfortunately for Weiss, she soon realized the foolishness of her strategy as Ruby merely reached out and grabbed her in her massive hand.

“FE, FI, FO FUM,” she giggled aloud, “I CAUGHT A HUNTRESS AS BIG AS MY THUMB.”

Wasting no time, the other three charged forward, trying to think on the fly.

“Weiss lost her nerve!” Yang said. “Now what?”

“We can still make the plan work!” Blake said as she charged forward, using her semblance to create shadow clones and hoping the the numerical assault would at least confuse Ruby. The assault was quickly noticed by the crimson huntress, who looked on at the tiny Weiss in her hands.

“Sorry, but I’m going to need both my free hands for this!”

With a quick throw, Ruby tossed Weiss into the air, the heiress screaming all the while, as one of her massive hands effortlessly batted aside two of Blake’s shadow clones. The actual Blake used the distraction to try and launch an attack on Ruby’s torso, but found herself all but bouncing off their leader’s immense, thick muscle. Ruby couldn’t help but smile at this.

“My turn!”

“Ruby, come o...”

With one front push kick, all 62 feet of Blake was sent flying out of the clearing on top of the trees, causing the titaness to marvel at her raw power. Luckily she had ensured no one would be hurt during the exercise, because that kick could have turned a six story hill into powder.

Ruby wasn’t the only one thinking about her raw strength and size as Weiss yelled, flying through the air until she hit something soft and thankfully yielding.

“Gotcha! You okay Weiss? Weiss?”

Looking at the heiress she was holding against her chest, Yang saw that Weiss was clearly spent mentally. She shook her head at the tiny heiress, wondering what possessed her to challenge her sister directly given the immense size and strength difference. In a weird, dumb kind of way it was admirable for a little person to want to challenge a Gigant directly, but challenging Ruby head on before was a bad idea. After she had more than doubled in size and muscle it was nothing short of idiotic.

Still, no time to worry about bravery vs stupidity. Gently placing Weiss on the ground where she wouldn’t be accidentally stomped, Yang returned to the task at hand. And with Blake and Weiss were out of it for now It meant Phyrrha and her had to try and knock Ruby out of her circle without the benefit of a distraction.

“Stick to the plan!” Yang yelled as she charged towards Ruby’s right leg. Phyrrha nodded as she went for the left. Interestingly, Ruby didn’t prepare any defense, more curious if she could stand up to what the two girls were about to do. Yang grinned to herself.

“You always were a bit too confident,” Yang said to herself as she charged the leg. With Phyrrha in synch, both girls tackled Ruby’s legs with enough force to topple a mountain. They could only hope the muscle mountain that was the leader of Team RWBY would fall as well.
11233112222122221311.title: The challengers make the first move

112331122221222213111.content:
As the combined forces hit the huge unmovable giantess, Yang and Pyrrha notice that they barely moved Ruby from her spot. Didn’t want to stop trying, Yang and Pyrrha put it into high gear with only getting little to no head way.

Ruby let out a bellowing chuckle that her sister and Pyrrha could move her.

As Ruby was not paying attention to this little sparring match and more towards how powerful she was, out of nowhere Blake came soaring from the sky and kick the titan Ruby square in the chest. This made Ruby’s knees buckled as the giant cat faunus was now helping pushing Ruby from her spot.

This was the advantage that they needed but, for some reason Ruby was still holding her ground with three Gigants pushing into her.

“Come on guys,” Yang tensely said to her team, “you know what they say.”

“United we stand,” Blake begins to said in a equally tense voice as she push harder.

“Divided we fall,” Pyrrha finished the saying as she use all her might to bring down Ruby.

With a surprise surge of strength, Ruby begins to push back as the three Gigants were losing ground. Chuckling she said in a bellow, “Yes, united you stand but,” as she grunt, “you’re miss a member,” as she was bring a foot.

Surprise that Ruby still have so much strength left, the team of Blake, Yang, and Pyrrha was losing hope until they heard a squeak on the ground.

“You know guys,” Weiss was yelling at her humongous teammates, “I always like the saying, the bigger they are,” as Ruby brought her foot down and Weiss cast a giant glyphs below the giant’s feet, “the harder they fall,” as the surface below Ruby became slippery with ice.

This in tune, made it easier to push the titan Ruby back more and more.

“Come on girls,” Weiss still yelling, “one last push,” as she summoned an Arma Gigas to help push.
112331122221222213111.title: Ruby starts to lose her balance!  It worked!

choices: Time to move on to a new exercise
Pack it in for the day, head back to Beacon
1123311222212222131112.content:
As she began to sway to and fro, Ruby began to regret not paying attention to the attack from all sides. Between the three Gigants pushing against her legs, the ice on the ground causing her to slip, and the Arma Gigas Weiss had summoned, she was rapidly losing her balance, swinging her massive arms back and forth comically in a desperate attempt to stay upright.

“Keep pushing!” Yang yelled. “We’ve almost got her!” The other Gigants grunted in agreement, moving against the monolith that was their team leader as she struggled to stay upright. Even with their new, bigger bodies, pushing against Ruby was exhausting, but none of the team were set to give up.

From her position below her massive teammates and Pyrrha, Weiss grinned. If they could just knock Ruby over onto that humongous butt of hers, she would be completely out of the circle she had to defend. Victory would be theirs, Weiss would have something to lord over the mountainous team leader forever, and she wouldn’t have to do chores for a month. Directing the ice and Gigas to push, she felt victory was in hand.

Ruby meanwhile, was realizing she was going to fall over in a matter of seconds. She had to accept that. But what she didn’t have to accept was falling the way they wanted.

“Whoa!”

“More ice!” Weiss yelled. “That will tip her!”

Feeling the ice form under her feet, Ruby put her plan into action. She used the ice to allow herself to fall forward, right on top of the group.

“Look out below!” She yelled.

“Oh no...”

“Look out!”

“Move!”

Seeing the huge shadow loom over, Weiss began to move as quickly as she could, but it was too late. With a mighty thud, Ruby hit the floor chest first with enough force to shake the ground as far as the campus. Looking around, she realized that falling forward had kept most of her body in the circle. She was also very glad the durability semblance was present for the girls, lest they be crushed under countless tons of muscle.

“Wow, that was something, huh guys? Uh, guys?”

Looking down, Yang was the first to recover, poking her head out from underneath Ruby’s massive breasts. Her face clearly showed annoyance.

“Dammit Rubes! We almost won! You couldn’t fall backwards and just give it to us?”

“What kind of a team leader would I be if I just let you win?” Ruby asked. “Besides, it was close!”

Feeling two other forms squirm underneath her chest, Ruby giggled as Pyrrha and Blake poked their heads out. They didn’t appear nearly as upset as she thought they would.

“When I said I didn’t want to get flattened,” Pyrrha said, “I didn’t realize you were literally going to try to flatten me. But still, that was definitely a good workout.”

“You’re not hurt, right?”

“Just my pride,” the spartan girl said. Blake nodded in agreement.

“Could you please get up? It’s kind of hard to talk when I can’t move.”

“Oh, right!” Ruby said, lifting her massive form off the ground. Free from Ruby’s titanic chest, the other girls stood up and dusted themselves off, none the worse for wear, but all upset that the “Queen of the Gigants” had bested them again even with their new, bigger bodies. Apparently the power boost didn’t matter as long as Ruby was still the biggest by a clear margin, making it clear that brute force wouldn’t be enough to win the day. Still, all three girls were feeling closer to their goal of winning a match with Ruby than ever, so they couldn’t bring themselves to be too upset.

Speaking of the others...

“Uh, where’s Weiss?” Blake asked. The girls looked around, only to gasp when they saw her.

Weiss was flat on the ground, having been crushed by Ruby’s crotch when she fell, unhurt, but once again out of it, groaning as she finally freed herself from the ground. Ruby covered her mouth in embarrassment as Yang laughed at the sight.

“Oops! Uh, sorry Weiss!”

“New plan next time a pack of Grimm show up,” Blake deadpanned. “We push Ruby onto them.”

“That might be overkill,” Yang joked, causing Ruby to sigh a bit.

“I won, so why does it feel like you guys beat me?”

“Chin up Rubes,” Yang said. “You’re pushing us...or crushing us, like a good leader should.” Ruby nodded, reasoning to herself that the team was improving if they were able to come up with a plan like that on the fly, and she was improving if she was able to beat them regardless with quick thinking.
1123311222212222131112.title: Right idea, wrong direction

choices: Go see if Yang is done with her shower
11233112222122221311123.content:
After the rather comically climactic ending to this bout it was safe to say that the girls had their fill with training exercises today and made their way back to school. Back at the campus grounds Ruby couldn't help but appreciate her most recent changes to reality. Almost every gigant had more than doubled in size, their massive bodies filling out their form fitting clothing more profoundly than they did earlier this morning. Their hyper muscular physiques, their immense bulges and curves and the way the “little people” reacted to them, though nowhere near as impressive as her own bulk, the aspiring huntress ,nevertheless, found completely mesmerizing, tantalizing even. Ruby had to wipe saliva from her mouth as a hunger she had never really explored before began to take root. However she could indulge in“that” later. For now though, she was content with exploring this new reality she created. Her friends and teammates decided to part ways for now to take care of some business. Yang wanted to take a shower and clean off all the dirt and grime she accumulated from their contest earlier, Blake returned to their dorm to catch up on her reading, Pyrrha said that she had to meet up with her teammates, claiming that they agreed to do something together later today, and Weiss said, in a rather curt tone, that she had some studying to catch up on, most likely she wanted to get some serious personal training done if the events of today's activities were anything to go by Ruby reasoned. With classes not being available today due to last minute renovations and her friends doing their own things, Ruby was left alone with nothing to do. She pondered on what to do with herself for fifteen minutes before deciding that she would go surf the web at the school library to learn more about the world she created. Ruby was in awe at the size of the building. Scaled for gigant accessibility, it reminded the scarlet tinted girl more of an oversized amphitheater filled with books than an actual library. Ruby wandered the building for abit. Bookshelves as tall and wide as buildings covered every square inch of surface. The young woman figured that a little person could easily get lost in this place if they weren't careful.
After walking around for a bit, whilst basking in the gazes of her fellow classmates and school faculty members in awe of her titanically proportioned bod, she found what she was looking for. A gigant scaled computer desk complete with PCs set neatly in a circular pattern. As she approached she found that the chairs and desks, despite being massive by normal standards in this world , were comically small before her Behemoth frame, Ruby chuckled at the site. Ruby had to use three of the gigant sized chairs in order to rest her epically scaled derriere comfortably which elicited another chuckle from the massive girl. Leaning rather uncomfortably forward in her seats, she typed in her password and got to looking for any hits on her web browser of choice. One of the first things she learned was that ever since the advent of gigants, the four kingdoms have had to spend billions of taxpayer lien in order to provide them with basic amenities such as food,water, clothing, and shelter. This coupled with the reality of Gigant growth spurts have given rise to fears of a global economic crisis . Ruby decided to note that tidbit of information for later. The second thing she learned was that the Gigant population have been invaluable in mankind's battle against the grimm, the unbelievable power their towering frames afforded to them allowed them to make short work of the creatures of darkness. As a result civilization has seen a period of growth and expansion the likes of which it has never seen before. Some settlements have even been built around wherever a gigant has made their home. Many have taken it a step further by creating nomadic caravans that follow wandering gigants around wherever they go. Ruby found that bit of information very interesting and decided she would definitely look into that later. The third and final thing she learned was that many of the world's truly powerful gigants are regarded as something akin to living weapons of mass destruction and as such are registered with the governments of the four kingdoms. Ruby found this as something of a shock but not really when she thought about it. Briefly she went to check on her scroll and, sure enough, she found a document labeling her as a “ Person of Mass Destruction” and the relevant legal information along with it. This both surprised and amused Ruby greatly.“ Wow. Guess I’m a pretty big deal huh?”Ruby thought to herself. Driven by curiosity, the silver eyed girl typed in her own name. She was quite surprised when she found that her inquiry returned eighty million hits! She clicked on the most recent article and began to read. What she found made her very intrigued. Most of it were things she already knew. She was one of the first gigants recorded and was the largest and most powerful on record but what really raised an eyebrow was that she was regarded as something of a celebrity and as a living landmark, that last one made Ruby blush a little. Apparently many people come far and wide just to get a glimpse of the towering beauty, Vale has made millions of lien from tourism thanks to her. Ruby had to admit that she was a little embarrassed about being a living tourist attraction but was also quite flattered. This next one however really surprised her. There are rumors of cults forming in the underbelly of society with Ruby as the center, worshipping her as a goddess and a harbinger of a new age for the world. Ruby wasn't sure how to feel about that last one and decided to ponder it some other time. With her curiosity satiated for now, the young prodigy got up from her seats and made her way towards the exit.
This was a lot of information to unpack, most of it sending her imagination into overdrive, she would definitely explore these scenarios later. Now though Ruby was once again wondering what to do next.

112331122221222213111232222.title: A Day in town

choices: The cookies are there no problem
Something’s wrong.  Does Ruby need to change more to save her favorite treat?
1123311222212222131112322221.content:
There were so many questions that Ruby had for the world, and especially her own power. The rise of Gigants had stretched the resources of the four kingdoms to their limits, but the rapid expansion of the population into areas previously held firmly by Grimm opened up land for resource use that would have been impossible in a word without them. With the Gigants growing in size and number, it seemed that the world, at least for the moment, had reached a balance, albeit a rather delicate one. If she changed the world again, such as giving the world a way to mass produce food and cattle, how would that affect society? She had made it a point to not change the circumstances around her friends too greatly, lest the changes alter them so much they stop resembling her friends. At the same time, if she could eliminate the worries of resource drain, there would be no limit to how big she could make herself or her fellow Gigants, and she greatly enjoyed being a towering, shapely colossus and the sight of such. Walking out of the library, she had come to an important conclusion.

She really wanted some cookies.

Heading on the road into town, and reasoning to herself that she would be better served looking at the city without her friends wondering if her big head had gotten a bump, she decided to head into the city to see how much it had changed in new reality, and to get some Gigant sized cookies. Those had better exist, she thought to herself, Or I’ll make them exist.

The trip to the town was interesting, with passerby’s on the “little people” part of the road stopping or slowing down to observe the monolithic Ruby in all her muscular, busty glory head towards the city. Once she had gotten into town, she noticed a similar setup, with roads and sections specifically for the Gigant population that were hastily being redone to account for their ever increasing scale. Walking around to find the bakery, she noticed another unexpected sight.

“Ruby!”

“Take me back with you Ruby!”

“Put me in your boobs Ruby!”

A crowd of little people had cheered for her arrival, saying things both flattering and not so flattering as she walked through the entrance to the town. Even a Gigant or two stopped what they were doing to stare and cheer for the titaness as she entered the city. It was flattering but odd. That being said, the two 60-something foot tall Gigant men cheering for her was quite the welcome sight.

Still, she would deal with them later. Her priority right now was...

“A bakery!” she cheered, leaping into the air and causing a massive quake. Many of the little people fell to the ground, but none of them seemed to mind, since they got to see Ruby’s titanic tits bounce while she did. Heading over to the bakery, she also noticed that none of the buildings showed any signs of strain. She figured in this universe, buildings were probably reinforced from the get go to deal with the strain of Gigants walking around.

The building didn’t have a standard entrance for customers. Instead, it was a window for customers similar to a drive thru, and both a menu and see through glass so people could see all the various treats for sale. She was greeted by a Gigant who was sitting down to fit himself in the area, the growth spurt from earlier putting space at a premium. If she had to guess, he was working here as a part time job while attending Beacon. Given the height of the building compared to her own enormous frame, she had to bend over to see the window, giving the crowd behind her a great view of her massive rear.

“Ruby! You’re looking lovely today!”

“Hey there! Tight fit?”

“You know how the buildings have to keep being adjusted. Especially when we have spurts like this. I can’t imagine it’s as bad for me as it is for you.”

“I’m sure they’ll give you more head space by the end of the week.”

“I hope so. So, what can I get you?”

“A box of chocolate chip cookies! Big ones!”
1123311222212222131112322221.title: Heading into town

choices: Ruby decides to return to her dorm
11233112222122221311123222212.content:
“Oooo sorry Ruby I'm afraid I can't do that.” The gigant man said remorsefully.
Ruby felt her heart sink into her stomach where her cookies should've been. “What! How come!?” The young titaness shouted, a very unsubtle level of desperation in her voice. The man just shrugged. “We've had a massive back order on baking order for baking ingredients for a few weeks now and we have yet a single crate.” The man readjusted the collar of his shirt. ”Just as well though. With the economic crisis we're in right now, the kingdoms can't afford to expend any resources on anything as flagrant as confectionery treats. In fact, many bakeries and candy stores have had to close Down as a result.” The man gave the girl the most apologetic look he could muster as he said this but it would do nothing to make her feel better.

“This can't be! This won't be!!!! I refuse to live in a world without cookies!!!”the silver eyed colossus shouted in a mix of anger and defiance in her mind. Yes. she would save her favorite treat. The only question was how. She didn't want to change things so much that her world stopped resembling her world, that was half the fun of this! She pondered on this conundrum for a few minutes until she got a brilliant idea. She closed her eyes and called upon her true semblance and reshaped reality once more. She added a new component to the Gigant race in the form of an aura that passively makes the environment and everything in it astronomically more fertile and more bountiful with the passage of time. The strength and range of effect of this aura is proportional to the size and strength of the Gigant.
When Ruby opened her eyes again she was overjoyed to see the shop was practically overflowing with baked goods of every kind, even Gigant scaled ones! The man came up to the counter again, this time with a huge smile on his face and, to Ruby's great delight, several stacks of massive Gigant scaled cookie boxes.
The Titaness drooled at the sight. “is it really okay for me to have all this?” she inquired towards the clerk, finding it strange that he would give her so many boxes when she only paid for one.
The Gigant man nodded. “ take them. There on the house! We've been experiencing a massive surplus of goods for awhile now. So much so infact that we simply don't know what to do with them all! So were giving a bunch of boxes for free for every purchase!” the man handed The Titaness the cookies who was more than happy to take them off his hands. After saying goodbye, Ruby made her way down the with extra pep in her step, causing small earthquakes as did. The aspiring huntress had to pat herself on her back. Another problem solved thanks to her godly semblance! Once more she felt very silly for living in fear of her power for so long.
“Okay. I got my snacks! Now what?” the scarlet juggernaut thought to herself.
11233112222122221311123222212.title: Post Scarcity solutions

112331122221222213111232222122.content: Ruby decides to show off for the crowd.
112331122221222213111232222122.title: Crowd pleaser

choices: It’s Jaune, and the rest of team JNPR
1123311222212222131112322221221.content:
With a spring in her step and several boxes of her favorite snack in hand, Ruby began looking through the city for something else to do. Already she seemed to have improved the world substantially for the better, between giving humanity a weapon that could defeat the Grimm, ensuring no one would need to go without food or snacks, and giving the people of the city a great view.

I earned this, she thought, happily munching on cookies big enough for ten little people to have. Walking down the road, she came across something that she couldn’t help but be curious about.

It was an outdoor gym, scaled for Gigants. The hypermuscular men and women strained against weights that would require industrial equipment to bring them over in pieces, as they overshadowed a much smaller building, presumably a gym for little people. Considering all the questions she had about what her body was capable of, the Goliath of a girl figured it was worth a try.

“Hey guys. Can I try?”

The people at the various pieces of equipment gasped a bit, making Ruby wonder for a brief moment if they had done something wrong, before one of the guys hastily nodded.

“Ruby! Guess you wanted to try out your new body after the growth spurt, huh? Good thing we kept enough weights around for everyone’s new scale, but they might be a bit small for you...”

“I’ll manage,” she said, putting down her boxes of cookies and heading towards a squat rack, which in this case was a massive bar between two pillars. Getting as low as possible so she could fit between the pillars, Ruby bent her legs, waiting for the bar to be readied. With the other gym members loading the bar as heavy as it could go, Ruby raised her legs, and found it effortless.

“Wow,” was all she could say before squatting the unfathomably heavy weight as if was a light bag. She continued back and forth with her repetitions, the colossus’s massive legs effortlessly moving the weight around.

Unbeknownst to Ruby, as she did so, a crowd of little people began to form around the gym, all eager to see her demonstrate her power (and not minding the view of her gigantic ass as she squatted). When she finished 100 repetitions and put the bar back, the crowd was more than noticeable.

“Uh, you guys don’t mind, right?” she asked while holding her head with her arm. “I didn’t ask them to come, really!”

The crowd all nodded, with one of the guys saying “It’s good for business.” Smiling and nodding at the support, Ruby moved on to a bench and a bar that held enough weight to make it droop on the edges. Yet the massive girl was able to lift it fairly effortlessly. After the 80th rep, she finally began to feel a burn.

I can’t believe how light this feels! She began to wonder if there was any limit to her strength when a slight ticklish sensation formed on her midsection. Putting the bar up, she noticed an odd sight. It was a little person who had climbed on the equipment while she was zoned out, presumably to feel the shapely colossus up close. She began to turn a deep shade of red when two fingers lifted the little voyeur from his spot.

“Hey, you know the rules. You can look, but you can’t touch without a girl’s permission.”

Looking up from her place on the bench, Ruby turned her head to see who had caught the little pervert.
1123311222212222131112322221221.title: Display of power

choices: Ruby asks if she and her team  can Join team JNPR on their mission
11233112222122221311123222212211.content:
Ruby could recognize that voice from anywhere. “ Juane! It's you!” The young goliath shouted happily in excitement, accidentally shaking the earth and shattering many windows as well as nearly bursting the eardrums of the surrounding “little people” when she did. Ruby gave a sheepish apology before turning back to her friend. Juane and his 65 foot self smiled warmly at Ruby who was also glad to see her.
“ You know. One of these days you're gonna have to get a handle on those outbursts of yours. That is if you don't mind procuring property damage bills for the city" Juane jabbed at Ruby albeit in good faith.
Ruby's face was beet red “Yeah I'll keep that in mind.” She scratched the back of her head as she said this. Her chipper attitude immediately returned afterwards.
“ So what brings you here?” the silver eyed colossus inquired her fellow team leader. As she did she noted the boy's incredibly shredded body. It was magnificent even by most Gigant standards, she had made sure of that herself. Even so, this was the first time she actually saw it in person. She also noticed, to her delight, the very noticeable bulge in his elastic sweat pants.
“Uh.. Ruby?”
"Hmm-What!?” Ruby yelped in surprise, shocked out of her voyeuristic trance by her friend's voice, she also quickly wiped her mouth off of any drool, praying that no one noticed the reason for her distraction.
“I was telling you about how my team and I wanted to get a workout in before we went out on our mission.” The young man answered with a little bit of confusion towards his fellow leader's behavior.

“Oh right. Guess I was just lost in my thoughts.” Ruby really needed to get a handle on her libido, which was incredibly hard to do considering the fact she currently lived in a world born out of her deepest fantasies.

The two of them chatted for a bit until they saw they saw the rest of team JNPR enter the building .
Pyrrha's 66 foot self, having changed into a cleaner set of her outfit from earlier, greeted the two leaders from the entrance. Ruby also noticed the two forms of Nora and Ren sitting atop the Spartan girl's shoulders.

Nora greeted Ruby with her usual bubbly energy and made a comment about how Ruby should “show off the goods" to her adoring fans and make a buttload of cash from it. This elicited another blush from Ruby and for Ren to chastise the hammer wielder.
The three Gigants went to their gym equipment of choice and began to work out with great gusto.
Pyrrha was going to town on the leg extension, moving the mass of multiple city block with each curl in quick succession.
Meanwhile Juane was pumping out reps on the chest fly like a champ, the amount of force and pressure he generated between his mighty pectorals was enough to crush countless tons of coal into the hardest and purest of diamonds, outstripping even the strongest of hydraulic and gas based pressure machines ever built by man by an astronomical margin.

Ruby, wanting to push herself even further, added five times the amount of weight on the bar then before, she used her durability semblance on it just to be safe. She began to dead lift the weight with terrifying ease, pounding out reps at a speed unheard of. Ruby driven further by curiosity, experimentally attempted to lift the weight with one arm and found that it was just as easy to so as it was with two. Everyone in the gym, her friends included, had their eyebrows raised in awe at the unimaginable display of might. The scarlet tinted giantess smirked at their reaction and decided to show off in earnest. In a few moments she had procured a second Gigant scaled barbell identical to the previous one and proceeded to lift both of them up effortlessly and began to curl them like oversized dumbbells. The crowd from before and the gym occupants audibly gasped at the sight. With one arm, the Silver eyed colossus was pumping a weight that would've taken every other Gigant in the building working together to even begin to budge it and she doing easily with one arm and with two of them at that!
Ruby almost didn't notice that the crowd around her had expanded greatly since she started, so in the zone she was.
When she finally finished, The scarlet goliath dropped the two barbells on the ground, creating an earthquake that was felt throughout the city and even back at the school and leaving sizable dents in the gym's reinforced floor.
When Ruby finally came down from the after glow of her work out, she noticed the quite disheveled appearance of the crowd and immediately knew what happened.
“Oops! Sorry everyone! Guess I...haha.. got a little carried away.” Ruby sheepishly rubbed the back of her head as she said this.
A few minutes uncomfortably passed, everyone rendered speechless by what they saw.
Juane was the first person to regain his composure. “Wow Ruby! You really are the Queen of the Gigants!” Juane exclaimed with visible awe on his face.
Ruby smiled at the compliment. “Hehe…thank.” Ruby said while blushing.

Ruby and team JNPR continued their workouts for another two hours before they were satisfied , Ruby's fans being whipped up into an rapturous frenzy after her latest exploit all the while.
Juane and his teammates said their goodbyes to before making their back to beacon to get ready for their mission.
As Ruby left the gym she thought about what to do with the rest of her day .
11233112222122221311123222212211.title: It’s Jaune, and the rest of team JNPR

112331122221222213111232222122112.content: Ruby decides that she had her fill of the city today and chooses to head back to her dorm
112331122221222213111232222122112.title: Time to head home

1123311222212222131112322221221121.content:
Team JNPR had departed to take care of that assignment, leaving Ruby feeling both impressed at her monumental power, and a bit hot and bothered at the sight of Jaune as a muscular Goliath. She knew Pyrrah’s feelings for the boy were unchanged, but would she mind sharing? Hell, there’s enough of her to go around, she could have the entirety of Team JNPR with her and...

Breathing deeply to take in everything, Ruby decided to head home, just so she could process the day and all the information about her world. Not to mention it would be easier to prod her teammates subtly about what she wanted to do with JNPR rather than ask and find out she committed a major faux pass. With that train of thought, the bright red from her face slowly faded as she headed home, hoping to ask the others about it. Speaking of home...

“I wonder what Zwei’s like in this universe?” she idly thought on the walk back to Beacon. Was he going to be a handheld doggy or a super sized pupper? She hadn’t seen anyone walking around with pets, let alone Gigant scale ones, but maybe she hadn’t looked hard enough.

Her admirers waved her off when she left the city, but even on the road, the occasional car would still stop to observe the colossus mid-walk in an attempt to see her titanic tits bounce or get a view of her astronomical muscles. Unlike the city however, no one shouted at her or attempted to directly court her, but Ruby swore she could see a few little people either walking or in cars slap their boyfriends when they stopped to take her body in. It made her giggle.

Finally, she had made it back to Beacon, noticing a lot of construction going on from the entrance to the exit. It made sense, with Gigants growing bigger and more muscular whenever Ruby had a whim (although she planned to hold off for the foreseeable future), spaces needed to be redesigned to fit their bodies. Even buildings that seemed to have plenty of space to use were being adjusted to fit the possibility of future growth spurts, with Gigant students helping construction crews fit things into place.

“That’s it, right there, just a bit to the...ugh.”

Two Gigant men were doing their absolute best to lift a massive pillar for a new wing of the lecture halls, but even they were having trouble with the weight. Deciding to give the pair a hand, Ruby walked over and effortlessly lifted the pillar into place.

“I hope you don’t mind.”

“Mind?” One of the men said, his short brown hair fluttering with the wind. “You kidding? It was taking us forever to get that thing into place.”

“Yeah, thanks Ruby,” the other said. Nodding at the man and his brown haired co-worker, Ruby stared intently at the two and their muscled forms. Maybe she could just take them home instead if Team JNPR wasn’t receptive to her...

“Ruby? You alright?”

“Oh you know,” she nervously chuckled, hastily thinking of an excuse, “I’ve gotta lot of studying to do, but I didn’t want to go by without helping. Well, see you later!”

Sighing in relief, she finally made it back to her dorm to ponder the social norms and who would be receptive to her new feelings. As she walked in, she was greeted by...
1123311222212222131112322221221121.title: Back to the dorms

11233112222122221311123222212211213.content: Perhaps the other members of team RWBY?
11233112222122221311123222212211213.title: Someone else maybe

This shocked the Schnee heiress. It was the first time in her life that she slept until this time and not just that she miss her morning classes also.

“Rudy Rose,” Weiss said angrily, “I will have my revenge for this. But, how?,” she thought.

While thinking, Weiss got ready for her afternoon classes and was walking to the cafeteria when she had her idea. The sparing match that they had the day before. This made her eyes went wide but, it was the best chance she got at the moment.

By the time she was almost to the cafeteria, Weiss heard, “hey, Weiss,” coming from the cat faunus with her new booming voice.

This made Weiss cover her ears as she reply, “CAN’T YOU BE A BIT MORE QUIETER BLAKE!”

“Sorry,” Blake said a more quieter tone.

As her ears stop ringing, Weiss had an idea. She could blackmail Blake into helping out. This put an evil grin on her face. “Blake,” Weiss ask, “can you pick me up and put me on your should as we go to the cafeteria?”

Finding this request weird, Blake did it anyway to helped out her tiny teammate out.

Once on the black cat faunus’s shoulder, Weiss got close to her ear and said, “I know what you and Ruby did yesterday.”

1123311222212222131112322221221121322211.content:
Ruby basked in the afterglow of her “micro orgy" with a very satisfied smile on her face. She looked down at the sleeping forms of her tiny lovers and scooped them up with one hand before laying down on her back and placing them between her titanic boobs, she giggled at the sight. She made herself comfortable by resting her head on her hands while draping her perfectly sculpted left leg over the other.
Over the course of an hour, Ruby laid down in her bed simply staring at the ceiling. With her having at least taken the edge off her libido, her mind naturally drifted back to her earlier concerns such as the overall state of the world , the new social norms that would have inevitably come about from having an entire race of giants walking around, and of course, Juane and Pyrrha. The scarlet Titaness wondered how to best broach the subject of forming an intimate relationship with them. Briefly she considered using her reality semblance to make it happen but wasn't too sure about that, perhaps as a last resort. But then again, would that be ok? She thought really hard about it before giving up and deciding to cross that bridge when she got there.
The next thing she thought about was the world. In the relative time span of a single day, the world was almost completely unrecognizable from before she changed things. The Gigant population has, in its own way, made the world a much safer place for humans and faunus, able to easily drive away the creatures of grimm from settlements and providing the entire world access to a limitless wellspring of food and resources simply by existing. Speaking of which, she would have to look into the long term effects of that particular aspect of gigant nature later, it sounded very interesting ,along with the fact that whole settlements have apparently been built around their presence, it was a strange idea to the girl but not in a bad way. She also recalled something about how some Gigants are registered as living natural disasters and even weapons of mass destruction, this gave her an insightful idea of the politics of this world which made her wonder about how the four kingdoms utilize their Gigant populations, especially the super militaristic Atlas.
Atlas. some of her best friends are from Atlas, Weiss being chief among them and the other one being Penny .
The day they first met was one of Ruby’s fondest memories. There are some discrepancies the timeline of events though. In the original timeline Ruby had literally bumped into her as she was evading her chaperones. Imagine her surprise when she learned that her new friend was actually a robot of all things! They went on this epic getaway sequence where Penny's chaperones chased them all over the block, concluding when they crashed into a garbage bin.
In the new timeline however, they met when Penny was knocked bodily into the air by Ruby when she wasn't paying attention to where she was going. Ruby ‘s endless deluge of apologies only ended when she noticed the intricate machinery under her damaged skin. Penny pleaded with her to keep her robotic nature a secret and Ruby couldn't think of a good enough reason to decline. They spent a few minutes getting to know each other and instantly hit it off. When the lovable android's chaperones began to close in on her, she started to panic. In that moment, Ruby, seeing her friend in visible distress, decided to help her. Thinking quickly, Ruby plucked her friend from the ground and placed her deep into the depths of her cleavage, much to the robot girl's surprise. Ruby would then feed the Atlas goons a line of bull about seeing a ginger haired girl somewhere in the local mall when questioned.

When she felt the coast was clear, she pulled her metallic friend from out of her cleavage gave her a sheepish apology. Fortunately, she didn't seem to mind, mostly just happy to finally have some breathing room. They would spend the rest of the day just chatting with each other and enjoying the other's company. Eventually, the time for the cybernetic huntress to go home had approached. Spent another minute talking with each other before saying their goodbyes, at which point Penny activated her boot thrusters and rocketed off into the distance.

Back in the present, Ruby wondered what her mechanical friend was doing these days, she did hope she was doing well, what with all the drills and tests she was forced to do make sure she was in perfect working order. The Silver eyed colossus recalled the chipper automaton mentioning something about her being designed to defend humanity from threats like the grimm and terrorists but that can get pretty dangerous for a little person, even if their made of metal. Briefly she wondered what her friend would be like as a Gigant. Would she be able to do her job even better?
“too bad she's a robot.”Ruby thought to herself.
A wide grin began to form on her face.“And why should that be an obstacle?”
A plan forming in her head, she called upon her true semblance and began to her work.
First was her backstory. If she wanted to do this she would have to come up with a way to Justify her robotic friend's existence as a Gigant without compromising a fundamental component of everything that made her who and what she is.
Ruby thought of this for a while before settling on a idea.
When she was done she reviewed her work.
In the new timeline, after the advent of Gigants, the various governments and research institutes of the world began working tirelessly to ascertain the bizarre nature of their physiology to little or no avail. That was until one atlas scientist and robotics expert, Penny's “father”, found a way to not only replicate the phenomena but also to have it manifest mechanically using a method that he has yet to disclose to anyone. He spent years designing a defense system that would harness this technology in order to safe guard the people of remnant from any conceivable threat. The culmination of all that research was penny herself, built in the image of a friendly, if not unbelievably huge, girl in the hopes that the public would be put more at ease in her presence.
In this new timeline, their meeting occurred when one day, as Ruby was on a stroll through the emerald forest, she was struck by the sound of what she could she only describe as a thunderous boom followed by the ear piercing screech of an object moving through the air at unbelievable speeds. Ruby turned towards the source of the noise. In one moment, she saw a massive ball of flame careening through the sky at ludicrously massive hypersonic speeds, it's heat and wind pressure scorching and upending any boulders or trees in its flight path, before crashing into a nearby lake with such force that the explosion that it generated was reminiscent of a small nuclear blast. The cataclysmic impact created shock waves that utterly annihilated most of the forest, shredded half the school, and even produced earthquakes powerful enough to shake the entire country side, nearby settlements, and even the city of vale to its very foundations, Ruby recalled that the event was all over the news for weeks and nearly sparked an international incident.
Ruby, having tanked the lion's share of the blast like a champ, found herself buried under a massive pile of dirt and rubble. With a single kick, she freed herself from her earthy tomb and dusted her self off, she noted, to her annoyance, that her clothes had been reduced to mostly burnt rags that barely covered anything but decided that she would take care of that later. For now though, she had to figure what that was all about.
When the dust finally settled enough for to make out her surroundings, the sight she beheld took her breath away. Where there was once a lush green forest, now sits a massive crater of glass and molten stone, even topsoil was shorn away for miles. The Silver eyed titan made her way down the crater in order to get a closer look at what ever caused this. As she reached the center she made out the form of a humanoid silhouette crouched down in a sort kneeling position. Eventually, she was able make out key features. The source of the impact appeared to be a ginger haired girl around her age. She was clearly a Gigant, standing somewhere around at, at the time of this memory, 33 feet tall, ( she's 72 feet tall after the growth spurt)possessed of an incredible musculature typical of her kind and a pretty substantial pear shaped body, she had hips and thighs for days and an ass that just wouldn't quit! Ruby would muse to herself in appreciation. The mysterious girl, seemingly having sensed her presence, got up on her feet and to face her. The mystery girl gave Ruby one of the biggest, brightest smiles she had ever seen.
“ Greetings friend! My name is Penny! What is your name?” the now named girl stated with an disarming amount of energy with an outstretched hand.
Ruby was caught off guard by the girl's cheery demeanor, she definitely was not expecting this. Then again, she hadn't really known what to expect when she came down here.
“ Uh… I’m Ruby?” said the titanic huntress as she returned the handshake, unsure of what to make of this bizarre situation.
“Nice to meet you Ruby!” Penny shouted as she energetically shook her new friend's hand which caused her tits to bounce all over the place, incidentally, the girls tits were kind of on the small side by Gigant standards but were still very much bigger than her head.
It was at this moment that the girl seemed to notice the state Ruby was in, causing her to don a look of concern on her face.
“Oh my goodness! Are you alright? You look as though been through quite an ordeal.” The mysterious girl inquired worriedly as she fussed over Ruby's soot covered body and the burnt, crumbling rags that were once her clothes.
For her part Ruby couldn't help but chuckle at that, she found the girl's earnest attitude endearing.-

1123311222212222131112322221221121322211.content:
-“I'm doing pretty well considering the number you did on the forest.” Ruby gestured at their surroundings.
The odd girl seemed confused for a second but,as she looked around at the veritable hellscape that surrounded them, understanding began to don on her.
The doll like girl's joyful emeanor visibly dimmed after that, settling into one of shame.
“ Oh… I-I'm reeaalllyy sorry! I didn't mean for this to happen! I-I was just….never mind.”
The bow wearing giantess drifted off her last sentence, staring down at the ground.
It was at this moment that Ruby heard a crackling sound, the kind associated with damaged electrical equipment. This confounded the scarlet Titaness, there shouldn't be any such machinery for miles.
that's when she noticed the light of electrical discharge coming directly from her mysterious companion.
On the freckle faced girl's left leg was a gash with torn skin and the unmistakable appearance of incredibly advanced and intricate machinery.
“Whoa. What's up with that?” Ruby asked with a combination of shock and awe in her voice.
Penny appeared confused by the inquiry until she followed her new acquaintance's gaze.
In a panic, she placed her hands over her wound and crouched down,her back turned to Ruby in a futile attempt at hiding it.

Ruby was understandably befuddled by the girl's reaction, had she done something wrong?
She went to check if the green clad girl was okay when said girl suddenly tackled her into her chest
“Please, oh please don't tell anyone about this! I'll get into so much trouble!” the apparently cybernetic girl pleaded with her, desperately pushing against her chest as she did.

The red tinted young woman threw her hands up. “ Oka, okay! I won't tell anyone just…. Just tell me what's going on.” Ruby gently placed a hand on the girl's shoulder as a gesture of good will.
The usually chipper girl seemed unsure of herself for a while but after a few minutes she finally conceded.
Penny proceeded to tell Ruby about her life's story. About how she was actually a robot built as an attempt at creating a synthetic Gigant, About how she was not to interact with the general public until “she was ready", and how she was made to perform countless tests until was sick of them and decided to bail on her latest combat exercises and make a break for it.
This was a lot to take in for Ruby. An actual android? Not only that but a Gigantandroid?This whole situation felt like something out of a science fiction novel.
Of course , this would lead to a very important question to be asked , how did she get that “wound”? Ruby would further inquire.
Penny would explain that as she made her escape, the Atlesian military summoned a small fleet of some of their fastest fighter craft ever built to give chase! Try as they might though, they was no way they could hope to catch up with a machine of her caliber, especially a Gigant powered one!
Penny delivered that last sentence with a hint of pride in her voice, much to Ruby's amusement.
In a last ditch effort, the military were forced to make use of an experimental anti Gigant weapon in order to subdue her. She was halfway across the ocean when she was struck by an incomprehensible force in her left leg, causing her to lose control and make an emergency landing.

“And that's when I met you.” Penny said with that pep Ruby had become acquainted with.
This was a lot to process for the silver eyed warrior. That a machine such as penny could exist, and that the Atlas military is developing weapons capable of taking on Gigants, although that last part she kind of expected something like to come about sooner or later.

“ So what happens now?” Ruby asked , unsure of what any of this could mean going forward.
The titanic super robot bore a pensive expression on her face. “ I don't know. But I don't what to go back to atlas. At least not yet" penny absentmindedly kicked a stone on the ground causing it to be jettisoned through the air at super sonic speed, Penny winced from that.

“D-Don't get me wrong though, I love my father and the people at the labs it's just…” Penny trailed off as if searching for the words. “ They can be sooo…. Smothering sometimes. You know?
Ruby nodded in sympathy, her own experiences with her father were quite exasperating sometimes but she loved him to pieces.
All of a sudden the Mechanical maiden went ram rod stiff, causing Ruby to become very concerned.

“ My sensors are picking up high speeds movement from military aircraft 80 kilometers from our position! They'll be here in ten minutes! Penny grabbed her hair in thick tufts as she began to panic.
“ The blast from before fried my internal thrusters. It will take me at least thirty minutes for my automatic repair functions to make them usable again! Oh what should I do?”
Ruby, seeing her new friend's distress, knew what she had to do. She wound up a right hook before delivering a mighty blow to the ground beneath them. Once more, the land shook with fierce intensity as the very earth split apart in great fissures for miles causing hundreds of thousands of tons of molten material to spew up from the ground in great geysers. The monumental young woman shouted at a stunned Penny to get her attention and motioned for her to follow her into one of the holes she made where afterwards Penny would use her thermal weaponry to sear the hole shut, concealing them from her pursuers. Three whole hours passed with them sitting in that dark man made cave waiting for the authorities to lose interest. In the meantime, the two of them passed the time just talking to each other about life, their hobbies their interests, anything really, and in that time the two of them became fast friends. When the coast was finally clear, Ruby punched another massive hole out from the ground to make an impromptu exit.
Realizing that she should probably head home to face her father’s inevitable wrath and get it over with, she said her good byes to Ruby and jetted off into the sunset.

Back in the present, Ruby reviewed the new Timeline with a satisfied smile on her face. She really wanted to see Penny again but than again maybe she should wait until tomorrow.

1123311222212222131112322221221121322211.content:
Fatigue washed over Ruby as she remembered her first meeting with the Gigant android, and sleep took hold. She would have her come over in the morning, and the best part was, she knew just the excuse to have her do so.

Morning soon came and after the Goliath girl had sent her little lovers on their way, she began to wash up and went to have breakfast, hoping that the others wouldn’t be suspicious of any wrongdoings. When the others awakened, none of them said anything to confirm they had any suspicions, but just to be sure, Ruby had her semblance cause someone to knock on the door.

“Were we expecting a visitor?” Yang asked.

“Not that I can recall,” Weiss said. “Maybe someone’s here to make sure that you guys have extra room.”

“I’ll get it!” Ruby said, opening up the door, and smiling at who was on the other side.

“Sal-U-Tations!”

The sight of Penny at the front, a Gigant girl bigger than everyone else save Ruby, got everyone’s immediate attention as Ruby went to hug the 72 foot tall girl. Ruby half expected the cheers of a studio audience for her guest to echo, but instead settled for welcoming the musclebound android to her dorm.

“Penny! What brings you here?”

“Well, I wanted to see how you were, especially after yesterday. I experienced an incredibly powerful growth spurt and more than doubled my size and muscularity, but with no Gigants by...my home,” she continued, deciding not to casually drop Atlesian military secrets in front of Ruby’s friends, “I decided to come and see how you all were.”

“Well,” Ruby said, “we’re all a lot bigger after yesterday, and something tells me that it’s not going to be the last time either. But since you’re here, why don’t you come with us for our morning training? You guys don’t mind, right?”

“Mind?” Yang asked before reaching to shake Penny’s hand. “Can she keep...whoa! You’ve got a grip on ya, huh?”

“As do you, Yang, is it?” Penny asked. “I’m happy to meet more of Ruby’s friends.”

With a chuckle, Yang let go of her grip, surprised her usual hand crush introduction didn’t work on this girl. Almost like her grip was literal steel. “Yeah, something tells me you won’t have a problem keeping up with us.”

Blake nodded at the new girl, who returned the gesture, while Weiss couldn’t help but look on at her with a slight air of suspicion. Staring at her up and down, Penny took notice and lifted Weiss onto her hand.

“You must be Weiss. Ruby has said many things about you.”

“Good things I hope,” Weiss said, trying her best not to show any discomfort.

“Oh yes,” Penny answered. “She said you were the smartest girl she knew.”

“Penny!” Ruby said, a bit of embarrassment in her tone, but it was too late, as Weiss grinned from her spot in Penny’s palm.

“Well my body may not be huge, but my mind is colossal.” A slight tone of arrogance went over her voice as the girls all laughed.

“Well, I guess no one minds if you join us Penny!” The orange haired girl smiled and nodded.

“Wonderful! I’m looking forward to seeing what I can do with my new scale!”

With the introductions done with and breakfast finished for the other girls, the group headed on their way. Weiss was still enjoying the compliment that she had been given, Yang was ready to test the strength of Ruby’s friend, and Blake was wondering exactly where Ruby met this chipper but exceedingly formal girl.

“That reminds me Ruby,” Blake asked, “what are we supposed to be doing today anyway?”
